# <a name="sensitive-information-type-entity-definitions"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-104">Entitetsdefinitioner för typer av känslig information</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-104">Sensitive information type entity definitions</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-105">I dataförlustskydd (DLP) i efterlevnadscentret finns många typer av känslig information som är färdiga att använda i DLP-principerna.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-105">Data loss prevention (DLP) in the Compliance Center includes many sensitive information types that are ready to use in your DLP policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-106">Den här artikeln innehåller alla dessa typer av känslig information och visar vad en DLP-princip söker efter när den identifierar varje typ.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-106">This article lists all of these sensitive information types and shows what a DLP policy looks for when it detects each type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-107">Mer information om typer av känslig information finns i [Typer av känslig information](sensitive-information-type-learn-about.md)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-107">To learn more about sensitive information types, see [Sensitive information types](sensitive-information-type-learn-about.md)</span></span>

## <a name="aba-routing-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-108">ABA-routningsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-108">ABA routing number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-109">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-109">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-110">Nio siffror som kan vara i ett formaterat eller oformaterat mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-110">nine digits that may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-111">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-111">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-112">två siffror i områdena 00-12, 21-32, 61-72 eller 80</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-112">two digits in the ranges 00-12, 21-32, 61-72, or 80</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-113">två siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-113">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-114">Ett valfritt bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-114">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-115">fyra siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-115">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-116">Ett valfritt bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-116">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-117">en siffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-117">a digit</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-118">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-118">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-119">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-119">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-120">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-120">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-121">En princip har med medelhög säkerhet upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om, inom 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-121">A policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-122">Funktionen för Func_aba_routing hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-122">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-123">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_ABA_Routing hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-123">A keyword from Keyword_ABA_Routing is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-124">En DLP-princip har låg konfidens för att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-124">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-125">Funktionen för Func_aba_routing hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-125">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- ABA Routing Number -->
    <Entity id="cb353f78-2b72-4c3c-8827-92ebe4f69fdf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ABA_Routing" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="argentina-national-identity-dni-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-143">Argentinas national identity (DNI) number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-143">Argentina national identity (DNI) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-144">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-144">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-145">Åtta siffror med eller utan punkter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-145">Eight digits with or without periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-146">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-146">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-147">Åtta siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-147">Eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-148">två siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-148">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-149">en valfri period</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-149">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-150">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-150">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-151">en valfri period</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-151">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-152">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-152">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-153">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-153">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-154">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-154">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-155">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-155">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-156">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-156">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-157">Det reguljära uttrycket Regex_argentina_national_id hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-157">The regular expression Regex_argentina_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-158">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_argentina_national_id hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-158">A keyword from Keyword_argentina_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Argentina National Identity (DNI) Number -->
<Entity id="eefbb00e-8282-433c-8620-8f1da3bffdb2" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_argentina_national_id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_argentina_national_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="argentina-unique-tax-identification-key-cuitcuil"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-170">Argentinas unika skatteidentifieringsnyckel (CUIT/CUIL)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-170">Argentina Unique Tax Identification Key (CUIT/CUIL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-171">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-171">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-172">Elva siffror med streck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-172">Eleven digits with dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-173">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-173">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-174">Elva siffror med ett streck:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-174">Eleven digits with a dash:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-175">två siffror i 20, 23, 24, 27, 30, 33 eller 34</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-175">two digits in 20, 23, 24, 27, 30, 33 or 34</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-176">ett bindestreck (-)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-176">a hyphen (-)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-177">åtta siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-177">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-178">ett bindestreck (-)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-178">a hyphen (-)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-179">en checksiffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-179">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-180">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-180">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-181">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-181">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-182">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-182">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-183">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-183">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-184">Funktionen hittar `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-184">The function `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-185">Ett nyckelord `Keyword_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-185">A keyword from `Keyword_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-186">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-186">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-187">Funktionen hittar `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-187">The function `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Argentina Unique Tax Identification Key (CUIT/CUIL) -->
      <Entity id="98da3da1-9199-4571-b7c4-b6522980b507" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-226">Bankkontonummer för Australien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-226">Australia bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-227">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-227">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-228">Sex till tio siffror med eller utan ett bankkontornummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-228">six to ten digits with or without a bank state branch number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-229">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-229">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-230">Kontonumret kan vara 6 till 10 siffror.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-230">Account number is 6 to 10 digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-231">Bankkontor i Australien:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-231">Australia bank state branch number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-232">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-232">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-233">ett bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-233">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-234">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-234">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-235">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-235">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-236">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-236">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-237">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-237">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-238">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-238">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-239">Det reguljära uttrycket Regex_australia_bank_account_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-239">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-240">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_australia_bank_account_number hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-240">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-241">Det reguljära uttrycket Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-241">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-242">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-242">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-243">Det reguljära uttrycket Regex_australia_bank_account_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-243">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-244">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_australia_bank_account_number hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-244">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="74a54de9-2a30-4aa0-a8aa-3d9327fc07c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb" />
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
  </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-273">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-273">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-274">Ett valfritt bindestreck eller blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-274">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-275">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-275">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-279">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-279">Yes</span></span>

```xml

      <Entity id="76e83b3b-01ee-4530-aced-e667a6609f49" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-328">Australiens körkortsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-328">Australia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-329">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-329">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-330">nio bokstäver och siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-330">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-331">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-331">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-332">Nio bokstäver och siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-332">nine letters and digits:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-333">två siffror eller bokstäver (inte teckenkänsliga)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-333">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-334">två siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-334">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-335">Fem siffror eller bokstäver (inte teckenkänsliga)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-335">five digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-336">ELLER</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-336">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-337">En till två valfria bokstäver (inte teckenkänsliga)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-337">one to two optional letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-338">fyra till nio siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-338">four to nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-339">ELLER</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-339">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-340">nio siffror eller bokstäver (inte teckenkänsliga)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-340">nine digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-341">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-341">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-342">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-342">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-343">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-343">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-344">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-344">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-345">Det reguljära uttrycket Regex_australia_drivers_license_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-345">The regular expression Regex_australia_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-346">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-346">A keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-347">Inget nyckelord från Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-347">No keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Drivers License Number -->
<Entity id="1cbbc8f5-9216-4392-9eb5-5ac2298d1356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-medical-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-447">Australiens medicinska kontonummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-447">Australia medical account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-448">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-448">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-449">10–11 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-449">10-11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-450">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-450">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-451">10–11 siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-451">10-11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-452">Den första siffran i intervallet 2–6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-452">First digit is in the range 2-6</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-453">Nio siffror är en kontrollsiffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-453">Nine digit is a check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-454">Tionde siffran är problemets siffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-454">Tenth digit is the issue digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-455">Elfte siffran (valfritt) är det enskilda talet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-455">Eleventh digit (optional) is the individual number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-456">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-456">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-457">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-457">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-458">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-458">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-459">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-459">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-460">Funktionen för Func_australian_medical_account_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-460">The function Func_australian_medical_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-461">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-461">A keyword from Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-462">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-462">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
  <!-- Australia Medical Account Number -->
<Entity id="104a99a0-3d3b-4542-a40d-ab0b9e1efe63" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_medical_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number"/>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-474">Australien passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-474">Australia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-475">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-475">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-476">Åtta eller nio alfanumeriska tecken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-476">eight or nine alphanumeric characters</span></span> 

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-477">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-477">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-478">en bokstav (N, E, D, F, A, C, U, X) följt av 7 siffror eller</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-478">one letter (N, E, D, F, A, C, U, X) followed by 7 digits or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-479">2 bokstäver (PA, PB, PC, PD, PE, PF, PU, PW, PX, PZ) följt av 7 siffror.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-479">2 letters (PA, PB, PC, PD, PE, PF, PU, PW, PX, PZ) followed by 7 digits.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-480">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-480">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-481">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-481">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-482">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-482">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-483">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-483">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-484">Det reguljära `Regex_australia_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-484">The regular expression `Regex_australia_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-485">Ett nyckelord `Keyword_australia_passport_number` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-485">A keyword from `Keyword_australia_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-486">En DLP-princip har låg konfidens för att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-486">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-487">Det reguljära `Regex_australia_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-487">The regular expression `Regex_australia_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Australia Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="29869db6-602d-4853-ab93-3484f905df50" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>  
```

## <a name="australia-tax-file-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-507">Australiens skattenummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-507">Australia tax file number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-508">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-508">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-509">åtta till nio siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-509">eight to nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-510">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-510">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-511">Åtta till nio siffror visas vanligtvis med blanksteg enligt följande:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-511">eight to nine digits typically presented with spaces as follows:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-512">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-512">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-513">ett valfritt blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-513">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-514">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-514">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-515">ett valfritt blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-515">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-516">Två till tre siffror där den sista siffran är en bård</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-516">two to three digits where the last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-517">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-517">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-518">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-518">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-519">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-519">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-520">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-520">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-521">Funktionen för Func_australian_tax_file_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-521">The function Func_australian_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-522">Inget nyckelord från Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number eller Keyword_number_exclusions hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-522">No keyword from Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number or Keyword_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-523">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-523">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
   <!-- Australia Tax File Number -->
    <Entity id="e29bc95f-ff70-4a37-aa01-04d17360a4c5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_tax_file_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-535">Österrikes körkortsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-535">Austria driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-536">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-536">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-537">Åtta siffror utan blanksteg och avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-537">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-538">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-538">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-539">åtta siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-539">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-540">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-540">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-541">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-541">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-542">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-542">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-543">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-543">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-544">Det reguljära  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-544">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-545">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` eller `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-545">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="682f18ce-44eb-482b-8198-2bcb96a0761e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-672">Österrike-identitetskort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-672">Austria identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-673">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-673">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-674">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-674">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-675">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-675">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-676">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-676">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-677">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-677">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-678">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-678">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-679">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-679">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-680">En kombination av bokstäver, siffror och specialtecken med 24 tecken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-680">A 24-character combination of letters, digits, and special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-681">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-681">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-682">24 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-682">24 characters:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-683">22 bokstäver (inte versaler, siffror, omslag, snedstreck eller plustecken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-683">22 letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, or plus signs</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-684">Två bokstäver (inte teckenkänsliga), siffror, omslag, snedstreck, plustecken eller likhetstecken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-684">two letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, plus signs, or equal signs</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-685">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-685">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-686">Ej tillämpligt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-686">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-687">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-687">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-688">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-688">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-689">Det reguljära  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-689">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-690">Ett nyckelord  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-690">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
   
```xml
      <!-- Austria Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="5ec06c3b-007e-4820-8343-7ff73b889735" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-691">Nyckelord</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-691">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-692">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-692">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-693">identitetsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-693">identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-694">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-694">national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-695">personalaus denskö, österreich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-695">personalausweis republik österreich</span></span>

## <a name="austria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-696">Österrike passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-696">Austria passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-697">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-697">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-698">En bokstav följt av ett valfritt blanksteg och sju siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-698">One letter followed by an optional space and seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-699">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-699">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-700">En kombination av en bokstav, sju siffror och ett blanksteg:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-700">A combination of one letter, seven digits, and one space:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-701">en bokstav (inte en ärendekänslig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-701">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-702">ett blanksteg (valfritt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-702">one space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-703">sju siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-703">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-704">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-704">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-705">ej tillämpligt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-705">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-706">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-706">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-707">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-707">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-708">Det reguljära  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-708">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-709">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-709">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-710">Det reguljära `Regex_eu_passport_date1` uttrycket hittar datum i formatet DD.MM.YYYY eller ett nyckelord från `Keywords_eu_passport_date` hittas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-710">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-711">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-711">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-712">Det reguljära  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-712">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-713">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-713">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="1c96ae4e-303b-447d-86c7-77113ac266bf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-social-security-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-737">Österrikes personnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-737">Austria social security number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-738">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-738">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-739">10 siffror i det angivna formatet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-739">10 digits in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-740">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-740">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-741">10 siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-741">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-742">Tre siffror som motsvarar ett serienummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-742">three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-743">en checksiffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-743">one check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-744">Sex siffror som motsvarar födelsedatumet (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-744">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-745">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-745">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-746">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-746">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-747">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-747">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-748">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-748">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-749">Funktionen hittar  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-749">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-750">ett nyckelord  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-750">a keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-751">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-751">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-752">Funktionen hittar  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-752">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Social Security Number -->
      <Entity id="6896a906-86c9-4d19-a2da-6e43ccd19b7b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-778">Österrikes skatteidentifieringsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-778">Austria tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-779">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-779">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-780">Nio siffror med valfritt bindestreck och snedstreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-780">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-781">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-781">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-782">Nio siffror med valfritt bindestreck och snedstreck:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-782">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-783">två siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-783">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-784">Ett bindestreck (valfritt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-784">a hyphen (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-785">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-785">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-786">ett snedstreck (valfritt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-786">a forward slash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-787">fyra siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-787">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-788">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-788">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-789">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-789">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-790">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-790">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-791">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-791">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-792">Funktionen hittar  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-792">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-793">Ett nyckelord  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-793">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-794">En DLP-princip har låg konfidens för att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-794">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-795">Funktionen hittar  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-795">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="4fd58d22-af28-4451-b18a-6f722430a56d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-value-added-tax"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-818">Moms i Österrike</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-818">Austria value added tax</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-819">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-819">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-820">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-820">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-821">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-821">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-822">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-822">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-823">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-823">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-824">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-824">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-825">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-825">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-826">Alfanumeriskt mönster med 11 tecken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-826">11-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-827">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-827">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-828">Alfanumeriskt mönster med 11 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-828">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-829">A eller a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-829">A or a</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-830">T eller t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-830">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-831">Valfritt blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-831">Optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-832">U eller u</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-832">U or u</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-833">valfritt blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-833">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-834">två eller tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-834">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-835">valfritt blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-835">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-836">fyra siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-836">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-837">valfritt blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-837">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-838">en eller två siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-838">one or two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-839">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-839">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-840">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-840">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-841">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-841">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-842">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-842">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-843">Funktionen för Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-843">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-844">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-844">A keyword from Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-845">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-845">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-846">Funktionen för Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-846">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Austria Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="b6a3eda2-c56c-4b69-a5f7-dca34db00f48" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-documentdb-auth-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-864">Azure DocumentDB-autentiseringsnyckel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-864">Azure DocumentDB auth key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-865">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-865">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-866">Strängen "DocumentDb" följt av de tecken och strängar som beskrivs i mönstret nedan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-866">The string "DocumentDb" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-867">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-867">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-868">Strängen "DocumentDb"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-868">The string "DocumentDb"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-869">Valfri kombination av 3–200 gemener eller versaler, siffror, symboler, specialtecken eller blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-869">Any combination of between 3-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-870">En större än-symbol (>), ett likhetstecken (=), ett citattecken ("), eller en apostrof (')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-870">A greater than symbol (>), an equal sign (=), a quotation mark ("), or an apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-871">Valfri kombination av 86 gemener eller versaler, siffror, snedstreck (/) eller plustecken (+)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-871">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-872">Två likhetstecken (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-872">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-873">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-873">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-874">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-874">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-875">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-875">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-876">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-876">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-877">Det reguljära uttrycket CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-877">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-878">Det reguljära uttrycket CEP_CommonExampleKeywords hittar inte innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-878">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Azure Document DB Auth Key -->
<Entity id="0f587d92-eb28-44a9-bd1c-90f2892b47aa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
          </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-879">Nyckelord</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-879">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-880">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-880">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-881">(Tekniskt sett identifierar den här typen av känslig information dessa nyckelord med hjälp av ett reguljärt uttryck, inte en nyckelordslista.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-881">(Technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-882">contoso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-882">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-883">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-883">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-884">northwind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-884">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-885">begränsat läge (sandbox)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-885">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-886">onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-886">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-887">localhost</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-887">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-888">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-888">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-889">testacs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-889">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-890">com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-890">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-891">s-int.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-891">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-892">net</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-892">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-iaas-database-connection-string-and-azure-sql-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-893">Azure IAAS-databasanslutningssträng och Azure SQL en anslutningssträng</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-893">Azure IAAS database connection string and Azure SQL connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-894">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-894">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-895">Strängen "Server", "server" eller "datakälla" följt av de tecken och strängar som beskrivs i mönstret nedan, inklusive strängen "cloudapp.azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-895">The string "Server", "server", or "data source" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-896">com" eller "cloudapp.azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-896">com" or "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-897">net" eller "database.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-897">net" or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-898">net" och strängen "Lösenord" eller "lösenord" eller "pwd".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-898">net", and the string "Password" or "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-899">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-899">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-900">strängen "Server", "server" eller "datakälla"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-900">the string "Server", "server", or "data source"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-901">noll till två blankstegstecken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-901">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-902">Ett likhetstecken (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-902">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-903">noll till två blankstegstecken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-903">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-904">valfri kombination av 1–200 gemener eller versaler, siffror, symboler, specialtecken eller blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-904">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-905">Strängen "cloudapp.azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-905">The string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-906">com", "cloudapp.azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-906">com", "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-907">net" eller "database.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-907">net", or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-908">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-908">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-909">valfri kombination av 1–300 gemener eller versaler, siffror, symboler, specialtecken eller blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-909">any combination of between 1-300 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-910">strängen "Lösenord", "lösenord" eller "pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-910">the string "Password", "password", or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-911">noll till två blankstegstecken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-911">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-912">Ett likhetstecken (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-912">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-913">noll till två blankstegstecken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-913">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-914">ett eller flera tecken som inte är semikolon (;), citattecken (") eller apostrof (')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-914">one or more characters that aren't a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-915">Semikolon (;), citattecken (") eller apostrof (')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-915">a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-916">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-916">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-917">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-917">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-918">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-918">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-919">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-919">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-920">Det reguljära uttrycket CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-920">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-921">Det reguljära uttrycket CEP_CommonExampleKeywords hittar inte innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-921">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IAAS Database Connection String and Azure SQL Connection String-->
<Entity id="ce1a126d-186f-4700-8c0c-486157b953fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-iot-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-936">Azure IoT-anslutningssträng</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-936">Azure IoT connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-937">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-937">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-938">Strängen "HostName" följt av de tecken och strängar som beskrivs i mönstret nedan, inklusive strängarna "azure-devices.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-938">The string "HostName" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the strings "azure-devices.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-939">net" och "SharedAccessKey".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-939">net" and "SharedAccessKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-940">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-940">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-941">strängen "HostName"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-941">the string "HostName"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-942">noll till två blankstegstecken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-942">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-943">Ett likhetstecken (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-943">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-944">noll till två blankstegstecken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-944">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-945">valfri kombination av 1–200 gemener eller versaler, siffror, symboler, specialtecken eller blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-945">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-946">strängen "azure-devices.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-946">the string "azure-devices.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-947">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-947">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-948">valfri kombination av 1–200 gemener eller versaler, siffror, symboler, specialtecken eller blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-948">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-949">strängen "SharedAccessKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-949">the string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-950">noll till två blankstegstecken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-950">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-951">Ett likhetstecken (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-951">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-952">noll till två blankstegstecken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-952">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-953">valfri kombination av 43 gemener eller versaler, siffror, snedstreck (/) eller plustecken (+)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-953">any combination of 43 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-954">Ett likhetstecken (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-954">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-955">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-955">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-956">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-956">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-957">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-957">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-958">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-958">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-959">Det reguljära uttrycket CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-959">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-960">Det reguljära uttrycket CEP_CommonExampleKeywords hittar inte innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-960">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IoT Connection String-->
<Entity id="0b34bec3-d5d6-4974-b7b0-dcdb5c90c29d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-982">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-982">Checksum</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-987">Det reguljära uttrycket CEP_CommonExampleKeywords hittar inte innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-987">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml

<Entity id="75f4cc8a-a68e-49e5-89ce-fa8f03d286a5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
       <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords" />
       <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
           <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
       </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1003">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1003">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1004">Strängen "redis.cache.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1004">The string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1005">net" följt av de tecken och strängar som beskrivs i mönstret nedan, inklusive strängen "lösenord" eller "pwd".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1005">net" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1006">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1006">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1007">strängen "redis.cache.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1007">the string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1008">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1008">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1009">valfri kombination av 1–200 gemener eller versaler, siffror, symboler, specialtecken eller blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1009">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
