- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1012">Ett likhetstecken (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1012">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1013">noll till två blankstegstecken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1013">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1014">valfri kombination av 43 tecken som är gemener eller versaler, siffror, snedstreck (/) eller plustecken (+)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1014">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1015">Ett likhetstecken (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1015">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1016">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1016">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1017">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1017">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1018">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1018">Definition</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1020">Det reguljära uttrycket CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1020">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1021">Det reguljära uttrycket CEP_CommonExampleKeywords hittar inte innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1021">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml

<Entity id="095a7e6c-efd8-46d5-af7b-5298d53a49fc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-sas"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1036">Azure SAS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1036">Azure SAS</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1037">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1037">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1038">Strängen "sig" följt av de tecken och strängar som beskrivs i mönstret nedan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1038">The string "sig" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1039">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1039">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1040">strängen "sig"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1040">the string "sig"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1041">noll till två blankstegstecken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1041">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1042">Ett likhetstecken (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1042">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1043">noll till två blankstegstecken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1043">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1044">valfri kombination av 43–53 tecken som är gemener eller versaler, siffror eller procenttecken (%)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1044">any combination of between 43-53 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, or the percent sign (%)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1045">strängen "%3d"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1045">the string "%3d"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1046">alla tecken som inte är en bokstav med gemener eller versaler, siffror eller procenttecken (%)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1046">any character that isn't a lower- or uppercase letter, digit, or percent sign (%)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1047">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1047">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1048">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1048">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1049">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1049">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1050">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1050">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1051">Det reguljära uttrycket CEP_Regex_AzureSAS hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1051">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureSAS finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure SAS-->
<Entity id="4d235014-e564-47f4-a6fb-6ebb4a826834" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureSAS" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-service-bus-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1052">Azure Service Bus-anslutningssträng</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1052">Azure service bus connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1053">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1053">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1054">Strängen "EndPoint" följt av de tecken och strängar som beskrivs i mönstret nedan, inklusive strängarna "servicebus.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1054">The string "EndPoint" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the strings "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1055">net" och "SharedAccesKey".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1055">net" and "SharedAccesKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1056">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1056">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1057">strängen "EndPoint"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1057">the string "EndPoint"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1058">noll till två blankstegstecken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1058">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1059">Ett likhetstecken (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1059">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1060">noll till två blankstegstecken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1060">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1061">valfri kombination av 1–200 gemener eller versaler, siffror, symboler, specialtecken eller blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1061">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1062">strängen "servicebus.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1062">the string "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1063">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1063">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1064">valfri kombination av 1–200 gemener eller versaler, siffror, symboler, specialtecken eller blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1064">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1065">strängen "SharedAccessKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1065">the string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1066">noll till två blankstegstecken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1066">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1067">Ett likhetstecken (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1067">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1068">noll till två blankstegstecken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1068">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1069">valfri kombination av 43 tecken som är gemener eller versaler, siffror, snedstreck (/) eller plustecken (+)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1069">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1070">Ett likhetstecken (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1070">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1071">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1071">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1072">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1072">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1073">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1073">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1074">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1074">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1075">Det reguljära uttrycket CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1075">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1076">Det reguljära uttrycket CEP_CommonExampleKeywords hittar inte innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1076">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Service Bus Connection String-->
<Entity id="b9a6578f-a83f-4fcd-bf44-2130bae49a6f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1091">Azure Storage Account-nyckel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1091">Azure storage account key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1092">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1092">Format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1094">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1094">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1095">strängen "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1095">the string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1096">noll till två blankstegstecken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1096">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1097">Ett likhetstecken (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1097">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1098">noll till två blankstegstecken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1098">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1099">valfri kombination av 1–200 gemener eller versaler, siffror, symboler, specialtecken eller blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1099">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1100">strängen "AccountKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1100">the string "AccountKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1101">noll till två blankstegstecken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1101">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1102">Ett likhetstecken (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1102">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1103">noll till två blankstegstecken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1103">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1104">valfri kombination av 86 tecken som är gemener eller versaler, siffror, snedstreck (/) eller plustecken (+)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1104">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1105">två likhetstecken (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1105">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1106">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1106">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1107">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1107">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1108">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1108">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1109">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1109">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1110">Det reguljära uttrycket CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1110">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1111">Det reguljära CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter hittar inte innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1111">The regular expression CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1112">Det reguljära uttrycket CEP_CommonExampleKeywords hittar inte innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1112">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key-->
<Entity id="c7bc98e8-551a-4c35-a92d-d2c8cda714a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key-generic"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1130">Azure Storage (allmän)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1130">Azure Storage account key (generic)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1131">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1131">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1132">Valfri kombination av 86 gemener eller versaler, siffror, snedstreck (/) eller plustecken (+), före eller efter tecknen som beskrivs i mönstret nedan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1132">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+), preceded or followed by the characters outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1133">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1133">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1134">noll till ett av symbolen större än (>), apostrof ('), likhetstecken (=), citattecken (") eller nummertecken (#)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1134">zero to one of the greater than symbol (>), apostrophe ('), equal sign (=), quotation mark ("), or number sign (#)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1135">valfri kombination av 86 tecken som är gemener eller versaler, siffror, snedstreck (/) eller plustecken (+)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1135">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1136">två likhetstecken (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1136">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1137">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1137">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1138">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1138">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1139">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1139">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1140">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1140">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1141">Det reguljära uttrycket CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1141">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key (Generic)-->
<Entity id="7ff41bd0-5419-4523-91d6-383b3a37f084" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
## <a name="belgium-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1142">Belgiens licensnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1142">Belgium driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1143">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1143">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1144">10 siffror utan blanksteg och avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1144">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1145">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1145">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1146">10 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1146">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1147">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1147">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1148">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1148">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1149">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1149">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1150">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1150">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1151">Det reguljära  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1151">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1152">Ett nyckelord från `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` eller `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1152">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Belgium Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d89fd329-9324-433c-b687-2c37bd5166f3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-national-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1285">Belgiens nationalnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1285">Belgium national number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1286">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1286">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1287">11 siffror plus valfria avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1287">11 digits plus optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1288">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1288">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1289">11 siffror plus avgränsare:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1289">11 digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1290">Sex siffror och två valfria punkter i formatet YY. MM.DD för födelsedatum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1290">six digits and two optional periods in the format YY.MM.DD for date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1291">En valfri avgränsare från punkt, streck, blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1291">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1292">Tre siffror i följd (udda för män, även för kvinnor)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1292">three sequential digits (odd for males, even for females)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1293">En valfri avgränsare från punkt, streck, blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1293">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1294">två kontrollsiffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1294">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1295">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1295">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1296">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1296">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1297">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1297">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1298">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1298">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1299">Funktionen för Func_belgium_national_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1299">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1300">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_belgium_national_number hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1300">A keyword from Keyword_belgium_national_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1301">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1301">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1302">En DLP-princip har låg konfidens för att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1302">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1303">Funktionen för Func_belgium_national_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1303">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1304">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1304">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Belgium National Number -->
       <Entity id="fb969c9e-0fd1-4b18-8091-a2123c5e6a54" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1363">Belgien passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1363">Belgium passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1364">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1364">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1365">Två bokstäver följt av sex siffror utan blanksteg eller avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1365">two letters followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1366">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1366">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1367">Två bokstäver och följt av sex siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1367">two letters and followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1368">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1368">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1369">ej tillämpligt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1369">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1370">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1370">Definition</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1371">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1371">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1372">Det reguljära  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1372">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1373">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1373">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1374">Det reguljära `Regex_eu_passport_date2` uttrycket hittar datum i formatet DD MM YY eller ett nyckelord från eller `Keywords_eu_passport_date` `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` hittas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1374">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date2` finds date in the format DD MM YY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1375">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1375">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1376">Det reguljära  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1376">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1377">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1377">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d7b1315b-21ca-4774-a32a-596010ff78fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date2" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="belgium-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1404">Nummer för moms för belgien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1404">Belgium value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1405">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1405">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1406">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1406">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1407">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1407">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1408">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1408">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1409">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1409">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1410">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1410">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1411">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1411">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1412">Alfanumeriskt mönster med 12 tecken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1412">12-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1413">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1413">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1414">Alfanumeriskt mönster med 12 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1414">12-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1415">a bokstaven B eller b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1415">a letter B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1416">ett bokstaven E eller e</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1416">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1417">en siffra 0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1417">a digit 0</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1418">en siffra mellan 1 och 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1418">a digit from 1 to 9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1419">En valfri punkt eller ett bindestreck eller blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1419">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1420">fyra siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1420">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1421">En valfri punkt eller ett bindestreck eller blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1421">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1422">fyra siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1422">four digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1423">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1423">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1424">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1424">Yes</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1425">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1425">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1426">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1426">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1427">Funktionen Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1427">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1428">Ett nyckelord från Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1428">A keyword from Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1429">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1429">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1430">Funktionen Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1430">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="85b5b3c3-f2de-4ae8-ac46-fd3cb38bf9ed" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="brazil-cpf-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1442">Brasiliens CPF-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1442">Brazil CPF number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1443">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1443">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1444">11 siffror som innehåller en bediff och kan formateras eller vara oformaterade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1444">11 digits that include a check digit and can be formatted or unformatted</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1445">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1445">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1446">Formaterat:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1446">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1447">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1447">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1448">en punkt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1448">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1449">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1449">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1450">en punkt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1450">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1451">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1451">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1452">ett bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1452">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1453">två siffror som anger siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1453">two digits that are check digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1454">Oformaterat:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1454">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1455">11 siffror där de två sista siffrorna är kontrollsiffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1455">11 digits where the last two digits are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1456">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1456">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1457">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1457">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1458">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1458">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1459">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1459">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1460">Funktionen för Func_brazil_cpf hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1460">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1461">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_brazil_cpf hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1461">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cpf is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1462">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1462">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1463">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1463">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1464">Funktionen för Func_brazil_cpf hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1464">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1465">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1465">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil CPF Number -->
<Entity id="78e09124-f2c3-4656-b32a-c1a132cd2711" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="brazil-legal-entity-number-cnpj"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1477">Brasiliens juridiska enhetsnummer (CNPJ)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1477">Brazil legal entity number (CNPJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1478">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1478">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1479">14 siffror som innehåller ett registreringsnummer, branchnummer och kontrollera siffror, plus avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1479">14 digits that include a registration number, branch number, and check digits, plus delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1480">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1480">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1481">14 siffror plus avgränsare:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1481">14 digits, plus delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1482">två siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1482">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1483">en punkt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1483">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1484">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1484">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1485">en punkt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1485">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1486">tre siffror (de åtta första siffrorna är registreringsnumret)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1486">three digits (these first eight digits are the registration number)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1487">ett snedstreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1487">a forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1488">fyrsiffrigt branchnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1488">four-digit branch number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1489">ett bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1489">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1490">två siffror som anger siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1490">two digits that are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1491">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1491">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1492">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1492">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1493">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1493">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1494">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1494">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1495">Funktionen för Func_brazil_cnpj hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1495">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1496">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_brazil_cnpj hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1496">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cnpj is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1497">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1497">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1498">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1498">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1499">Funktionen för Func_brazil_cnpj hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1499">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1500">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1500">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil Legal Entity Number (CNPJ) -->
<Entity id="9b58b5cd-5e90-4df6-b34f-1ebcc88ceae4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="brazil-national-identification-card-rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1522">Brasiliens national identification card (RG)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1522">Brazil national identification card (RG)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1523">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1523">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1524">Registro Geral (gammalt format): Nio siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1524">Registro Geral (old format): Nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1525">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (nytt format): 11 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1525">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format): 11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1526">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1526">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1527">Registro Geral (gammalt format):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1527">Registro Geral (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1528">två siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1528">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1529">en punkt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1529">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1530">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1530">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1531">en punkt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1531">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1532">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1532">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1533">ett bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1533">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1534">en siffra som är en biffrig siffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1534">one digit that is a check digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1535">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (nytt format):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1535">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1536">10 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1536">10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1537">ett bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1537">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1538">en siffra som är en biffrig siffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1538">one digit that is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1539">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1539">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1540">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1540">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1541">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1541">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1542">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1542">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1543">Funktionen för Func_brazil_rg hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1543">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1544">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_brazil_rg hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1544">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_rg is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1545">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1545">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- Brazil National ID Card (RG) -->
      <Entity id="486de900-db70-41b3-a886-abdf25af119c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_rg" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="bulgaria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1556">Bulgariens körkortsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1556">Bulgaria driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1557">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1557">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1558">Nio siffror utan blanksteg och avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1558">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1559">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1559">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1560">nio siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1560">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1561">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1561">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1562">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1562">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1563">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1563">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1564">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1564">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1565">Det reguljära  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1565">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1566">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` eller `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1566">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="66d39258-94c2-43b2-804b-aa312258e54b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>    
```

## <a name="bulgaria-uniform-civil-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1693">Bulgariens enhetliga civilnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1693">Bulgaria uniform civil number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1694">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1694">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1695">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1695">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1696">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1696">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1697">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1697">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1698">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1698">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1699">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1699">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1700">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1700">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1701">10 siffror utan blanksteg och avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1701">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1702">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1702">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1703">10 siffror utan blanksteg och avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1703">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1704">Sex siffror som motsvarar födelsedatumet (AMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1704">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1705">två siffror som motsvarar födelsedatumet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1705">two digits that correspond to the birth order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1706">en siffra som motsvarar kön: En jämn siffra för man och en udda siffra för kvinna</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1706">one digit that corresponds to gender: An even digit for male and an odd digit for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1707">en checksiffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1707">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1708">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1708">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1709">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1709">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1710">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1710">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1711">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1711">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1712">Funktionen hittar  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1712">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1713">Ett nyckelord  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1713">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1714">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1714">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1715">Funktionen hittar  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1715">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Uniform Civil Number -->
      <Entity id="100d58b1-0a35-4fb1-aa89-e4a86fb53fcc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="bulgaria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1760">Bulgarien passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1760">Bulgaria passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1761">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1761">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1762">Nio siffror utan blanksteg och avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1762">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1763">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1763">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1764">nio siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1764">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1765">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1765">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1766">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1766">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1767">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1767">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1768">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1768">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1769">Det reguljära  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1769">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1770">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1770">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1771">Det reguljära `Regex_eu_passport_date1` uttrycket hittar datum i formatet DD.MM.YYYY eller ett nyckelord från `Keywords_eu_passport_date` hittas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1771">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1772">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1772">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1773">Det reguljära  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1773">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1774">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1774">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="f7172b82-c588-4216-845e-4e54e397f29a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1794">Bankkontonummer för Kanada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1794">Canada bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1795">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1795">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1796">7 eller 12 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1796">7 or 12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1797">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1797">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1798">Ett bankkontonummer i Kanada har 7 eller 12 siffror.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1798">A Canada Bank Account Number is 7 or 12 digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1799">Ett bankkontotransitnummer för Kanada är:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1799">A Canada bank account transit number is:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1800">fem siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1800">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1801">ett bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1801">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1802">tre siffror ELLER</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1802">three digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1803">en nolla "0"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1803">a zero "0"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1804">åtta siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1804">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1805">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1805">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1806">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1806">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1807">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1807">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1808">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1808">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1809">Det reguljära uttrycket Regex_canada_bank_account_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1809">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1810">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_canada_bank_account_number hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1810">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1811">Det reguljära uttrycket Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1811">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1812">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1812">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1813">Det reguljära uttrycket Regex_canada_bank_account_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1813">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1814">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_canada_bank_account_number hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1814">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="552e814c-cb50-4d94-bbaa-bb1d1ffb34de" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number" />
   </Pattern>
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1839">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1839">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1840">Varierar per provins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1840">Varies by province</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1841">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1841">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1842">Olika mönster täcker Alberta, British Columbia, Manitoba, New Brunswick, Newfoundland/Labrador, Nova Scotia, Ontario, Prince Edward Island, Quebec och Saskatchewan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1842">Various patterns covering Alberta, British Columbia, Manitoba, New Brunswick, Newfoundland/Labrador, Nova Scotia, Ontario, Prince Edward Island, Quebec, and Saskatchewan</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1845">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1845">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1846">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1846">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1847">Funktionen Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1847">The function Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1849">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_canada_drivers_license hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1849">A keyword from Keyword_canada_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1986">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1986">Format</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1987">10 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1987">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1988">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1988">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1989">10 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1989">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1990">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1990">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1991">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1991">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1992">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1992">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1993">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1993">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1994">Det reguljära uttrycket Regex_canada_health_service_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1994">The regular expression Regex_canada_health_service_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-1995">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_canada_health_service_number hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-1995">A keyword from Keyword_canada_health_service_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Health Service Number -->
<Entity id="59c0bf39-7fab-482c-af25-00faa4384c94" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_health_service_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_health_service_number" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2007">Kanada passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2007">Canada passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2008">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2008">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2009">Två versaler följt av sex siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2009">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2010">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2010">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2011">Två versaler följt av sex siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2011">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2012">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2012">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2013">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2013">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2014">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2014">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2015">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2015">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2016">Det reguljära uttrycket Regex_canada_passport_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2016">The regular expression Regex_canada_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2017">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_canada_passport_number eller Keyword_passport hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2017">A keyword from Keyword_canada_passport_number or Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml 
<!-- Canada Passport Number -->
<Entity id="14d0db8b-498a-43ed-9fca-f6097ae687eb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-personal-health-identification-number-phin"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2047">Canada Personal Health Identification Number (PHIN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2047">Canada personal health identification number (PHIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2048">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2048">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2049">nio siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2049">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2050">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2050">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2051">nio siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2051">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2052">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2052">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2053">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2053">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2054">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2054">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2055">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2055">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2056">Det reguljära uttrycket Regex_canada_phin hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2056">The regular expression Regex_canada_phin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2057">Minst två nyckelord från Keyword_canada_phin eller Keyword_canada_provinces hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2057">At least two keywords from Keyword_canada_phin or Keyword_canada_provinces are found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada PHIN -->
<Entity id="722e12ac-c89a-4ec8-a1b7-fea3469f89db" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_phin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_phin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_provinces" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
