## <a name="canada-social-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2090">Kanadas socialförsäkringsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2090">Canada social insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2091">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2091">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2092">Nio siffror med valfria bindestreck eller blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2092">nine digits with optional hyphens or spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2093">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2093">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2094">Formaterat:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2094">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2095">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2095">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2096">Ett bindestreck eller blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2096">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2097">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2097">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2098">Ett bindestreck eller blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2098">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2099">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2099">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2100">Oformaterad: nio siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2100">Unformatted: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2101">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2101">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2102">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2102">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2103">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2103">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2104">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2104">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2105">Funktionen för Func_canadian_sin hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2105">The function Func_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2106">Minst två av följande kombinationer:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2106">At least two of any combination of the following:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2107">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_sin hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2107">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2108">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_sin_collaborative hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2108">A keyword from Keyword_sin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2109">Funktionen Func_eu_date hittar ett datum i rätt datumformat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2109">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2110">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2110">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2111">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2111">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2112">Funktionen för Func_unformatted_canadian_sin hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2112">The function Func_unformatted_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2113">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_sin hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2113">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2114">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2114">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="a2f29c85-ecb8-4514-a610-364790c0773e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_canadian_sin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_canadian_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="chile-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2139">Chiles identitetskortsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2139">Chile identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2140">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2140">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2141">sju till åtta siffror plus avgränsare en kontrollerad siffra eller bokstav</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2141">seven to eight digits plus delimiters a check digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2142">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2142">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2143">sju till åtta siffror plus avgränsare:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2143">seven to eight digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2144">En till två siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2144">one to two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2145">en valfri period</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2145">an optional period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2146">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2146">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2147">en valfri period</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2147">an optional period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2148">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2148">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2149">ett streck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2149">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2150">en siffra eller bokstav (inte en teckenkänslig) som är en kontrollsiffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2150">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2151">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2151">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2152">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2152">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2153">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2153">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2154">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2154">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2155">Funktionen för Func_chile_id_card hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2155">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2156">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_chile_id_card hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2156">A keyword from Keyword_chile_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2157">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2157">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2158">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2158">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2159">Funktionen för Func_chile_id_card hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2159">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2160">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2160">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Chile Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="4e979794-49a0-407e-a0b9-2c536937b925" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="china-resident-identity-card-prc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2197">Inhörande identitetskort (Folkrepubliken Kina) i Kina</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2197">China resident identity card (PRC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2198">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2198">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2199">18 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2199">18 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2200">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2200">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2201">18 siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2201">18 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2202">Sex siffror som är en adresskod</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2202">six digits that are an address code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2203">Åtta siffror i formuläret YYYYMMDD, som är födelsedatumet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2203">eight digits in the form YYYYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2204">tre siffror som är en orderkod</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2204">three digits that are an order code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2205">en siffra som är en biffrig siffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2205">one digit that is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2206">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2206">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2207">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2207">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2208">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2208">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2209">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2209">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2210">Funktionen för Func_china_resident_id hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2210">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2211">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_china_resident_id hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2211">A keyword from Keyword_china_resident_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2212">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2212">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2213">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2213">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2214">Funktionen för Func_china_resident_id hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2214">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2215">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2215">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- China Resident Identity Card (PRC) Number -->
<Entity id="c92daa86-2d16-4871-901f-816b3f554fc1" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2218">Insvarande identitetskort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2218">Resident Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2219">Folkrepubliken Kina</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2219">PRC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2220">National Identification Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2220">National Identification Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2221">身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2221">身份证</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2223">居民身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2223">居民身份证</span></span>

## <a name="credit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2228">Kreditkortsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2228">Credit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2229">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2229">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2230">14 till 16 siffror som kan vara formaterade eller oformaterade (ddddddddddd) och som måste passera Luhn-testet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2230">14 to 16 digits that can be formatted or unformatted (dddddddddddddddd) and that must pass the Luhn test.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2231">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2231">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2232">Komplext och robust mönster som identifierar kort från alla större varumärken över hela världen, inklusive Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, presentkort och betalkort.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2232">Complex and robust pattern that detects cards from all major brands worldwide, including Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, gift cards, and diner cards.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2233">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2233">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2234">Ja, Luhn-kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2234">Yes, the Luhn checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2235">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2235">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2236">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2236">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2237">Funktionen Func_credit_card hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2237">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2238">Något av följande är sant:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2238">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2239">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_cc_verification hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2239">A keyword from Keyword_cc_verification is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2240">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_cc_name hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2240">A keyword from Keyword_cc_name is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2241">Funktionen Func_expiration_date hittar ett datum i rätt datumformat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2241">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2242">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2242">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2243">En DLP-princip har låg konfidens för att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2243">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2244">Funktionen Func_credit_card hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2244">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2245">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2245">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Credit Card Number -->
<Entity id="50842eb7-edc8-4019-85dd-5a5c1f2bb085" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_verification" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_name" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2505">Kroatiens körkortsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2505">Croatia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2506">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2506">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2507">Åtta siffror utan blanksteg och avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2507">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2508">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2508">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2509">åtta siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2509">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2510">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2510">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2511">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2511">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2512">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2512">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2513">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2513">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2514">Det reguljära  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2514">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2515">Ett nyckelord från `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` eller `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2515">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="005b3ef1-47dd-4e68-bb02-c6db484d00f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2639">Kroatiens identitetskortsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2639">Croatia identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2640">Den här typen av känslig information ingår i den nationella identifieringstypen (EU).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2640">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2641">Det är tillgängligt som en fristående typ av känslig information.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2641">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2642">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2642">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2643">nio siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2643">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2644">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2644">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2645">nio siffror i följd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2645">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2646">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2646">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2647">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2647">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2648">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2648">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2649">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2649">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2650">Funktionen för Func_croatia_id_card hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2650">The function Func_croatia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2651">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_croatia_id_card hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2651">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Croatia Identity Card Number-->
<Entity id="ff12f884-c20a-4189-b185-34c8e7258d47" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2682">Kroatien passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2682">Croatia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2683">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2683">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2684">Nio siffror utan blanksteg och avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2684">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2685">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2685">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2686">nio siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2686">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2687">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2687">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2688">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2688">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2689">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2689">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2690">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2690">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2691">Det reguljära  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2691">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2692">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2692">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2693">Det reguljära `Regex_eu_passport_date1` uttrycket hittar datum i formatet DD.MM.YYYY eller ett nyckelord från `Keywords_eu_passport_date` hittas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2693">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2694">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2694">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2695">Det reguljära  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2695">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2696">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2696">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Croatia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7d7a729d-32d8-4204-8d01-d5e6a6c25581" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2710">broj putovnice</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2710">broj putovnice</span></span>

## <a name="croatia-personal-identification-oib-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2714">Kroatiens id-nummer (OIB)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2714">Croatia personal identification (OIB) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2715">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2715">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2716">11 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2716">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2717">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2717">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2718">11 siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2718">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2719">10 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2719">10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2720">slutsiffra är en kontrollsiffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2720">final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2721">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2721">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2722">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2722">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2723">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2723">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2724">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2724">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2725">Funktionen för Func_croatia_oib_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2725">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2726">Ett nyckelord från Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2726">A keyword from Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2727">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2727">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2728">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2728">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2729">Funktionen för Func_croatia_oib_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2729">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2730">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2730">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Personal Identification (OIB) Number -->
      <Entity id="31983b6d-db95-4eb2-a630-b44bd091968d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2761">Licensnummer för cyperns drivrutiner</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2761">Cyprus drivers license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2762">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2762">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2763">12 siffror utan blanksteg och avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2763">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2764">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2764">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2765">12 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2765">12 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2766">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2766">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2767">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2767">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2768">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2768">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2769">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2769">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2770">Det reguljära  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2770">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2771">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` eller `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2771">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="356fa104-f9ac-4aff-a0e4-2e6e65ea06c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2896">Identitetskort för Cypern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2896">Cyprus identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2897">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2897">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2898">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2898">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2899">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2899">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2900">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2900">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2901">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2901">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2902">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2902">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2903">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2903">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2904">10 siffror utan blanksteg och avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2904">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2905">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2905">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2906">10 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2906">10 digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2907">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2907">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2908">ej tillämpligt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2908">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2909">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2909">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2910">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2910">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2911">Det reguljära  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2911">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2912">Ett nyckelord  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2912">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml 
      <!-- Cyprus Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="3ba8afe5-7a6c-4929-8247-0001b6878438" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2914">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2914">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2918">national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2918">national identification number</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2921">Cypern passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2921">Cyprus passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2922">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2922">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2923">en bokstav följt av 6–8 siffror utan blanksteg eller avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2923">one letter followed by 6-8 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2924">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2924">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2925">en bokstav följt av sex till åtta siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2925">one letter followed by six to eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2926">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2926">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2927">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2927">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2928">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2928">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2929">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2929">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2930">Det reguljära  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2930">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2931">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2931">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2932">Det reguljära `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date` uttrycket hittar datum i formatet DD/MM/YYY eller ett nyckelord från `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date` hittas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2932">The regular expression `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD/MM/YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2933">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2933">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2934">Det reguljära  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2934">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2935">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2935">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>  
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="9193e2e8-7f8c-43c1-a274-ac40d651936f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2964">Skatteidentifieringsnummer för Cypern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2964">Cyprus tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2965">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2965">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2966">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2966">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2967">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2967">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2968">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2968">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2969">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2969">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2970">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2970">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2971">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2971">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2972">Åtta siffror och en bokstav i det angivna mönstret</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2972">eight digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2973">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2973">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2974">Åtta siffror och en bokstav:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2974">eight digits and one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2975">a "0" eller "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2975">a "0" or "9"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2976">sju siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2976">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2977">en bokstav (inte en ärendekänslig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2977">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2978">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2978">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2979">ej tillämpligt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2979">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2980">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2980">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2981">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2981">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2982">Funktionen hittar  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2982">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2983">Ett nyckelord  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2983">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2984">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2984">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-2985">Funktionen hittar  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-2985">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="40e64bd9-55f3-4a09-9bd6-1db18dced9dd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3013">Tjeckiska körkortsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3013">Czech driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3014">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3014">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3015">Två bokstäver följt av sex siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3015">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3016">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3016">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3017">Åtta bokstäver och siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3017">eight letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3018">bokstaven "E" (inte den är det.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3018">letter 'E' (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3019">en bokstav</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3019">a letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3020">ett blanksteg (valfritt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3020">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3021">sex siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3021">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3022">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3022">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3023">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3023">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3024">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3024">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3025">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3025">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3026">Det reguljära  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3026">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3027">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` eller `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3027">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <Entity id="86b40d3b-d8ea-4c36-aab0-ef9416a6769c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="czech-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3153">Tjeckiska passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3153">Czech passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3154">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3154">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3155">Åtta siffror utan blanksteg eller avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3155">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3156">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3156">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3157">Åtta siffror utan blanksteg eller avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3157">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3158">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3158">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3159">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3159">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3160">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3160">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3161">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3161">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3162">Det reguljära  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3162">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3163">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3163">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3164">Det reguljära `Regex_eu_passport_date1` uttrycket hittar datum i formatet DD.MM.YYYY eller ett nyckelord från `Keywords_eu_passport_date` hittas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3164">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3165">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3165">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3166">Det reguljära  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3166">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3167">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3167">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Czech Republic Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7bcd8ce8-5e92-4bbe-bc92-fa669f0369fa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-personal-identity-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3189">Tjeckiska personnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3189">Czech personal identity number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3190">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3190">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3191">Nio siffror med valfritt snedstreck (gammalt format) 10 siffror med valfritt snedstreck (nytt format)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3191">nine digits with optional forward slash (old format) 10 digits with optional forward slash (new format)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3192">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3192">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3193">Nio siffror (gammalt format):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3193">nine digits (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3194">Sex siffror som representerar födelsedatum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3194">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3195">ett valfritt snedstreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3195">an optional forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3196">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3196">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3197">10 siffror (nytt format):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3197">10 digits (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3198">Sex siffror som representerar födelsedatum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3198">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3199">ett valfritt snedstreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3199">an optional forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3200">fyra siffror där sista siffran är en bård</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3200">four digits where last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3201">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3201">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3202">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3202">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3203">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3203">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3204">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3204">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3205">Funktionen för Func_czech_id_card hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3205">The function Func_czech_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3206">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_czech_id_card hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3206">A keyword from Keyword_czech_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3207">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3207">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3208">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3208">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3209">Funktionen Func_czech_id_card_new_format hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3209">The function Func_czech_id_card_new_format finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3210">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3210">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <Entity id="60c0725a-4eb6-455b-9dda-05d8a7396497" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_czech_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3000.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card_new_format" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3257">Danmarks körkortsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3257">Denmark driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3258">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3258">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3259">Åtta siffror utan blanksteg och avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3259">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3260">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3260">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3261">åtta siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3261">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3262">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3262">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3263">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3263">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3264">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3264">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3265">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3265">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3266">Det reguljära  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3266">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3267">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` eller `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3267">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Denmark Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="98a95812-6203-451a-a220-d39870ebef0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3391">Danmark passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3391">Denmark passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3392">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3392">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3393">Nio siffror utan blanksteg och avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3393">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3394">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3394">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3395">nio siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3395">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3396">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3396">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3397">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3397">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3398">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3398">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3399">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3399">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3400">Det reguljära  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3400">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3401">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3401">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3402">Det reguljära `Regex_eu_passport_date2` uttrycket hittar datum i formatet DD MM YY eller ett nyckelord från `Keywords_eu_passport_date` hittas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3402">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date2` finds date in the format DD MM YY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3403">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3403">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3404">Det reguljära  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3404">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3405">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3405">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Denmark Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="25e8c47e-e6fe-4884-a211-74898f8c0196" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date2" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="denmark-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3425">Danmarks personliga ID-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3425">Denmark personal identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3426">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3426">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3427">10 siffror som innehåller ett bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3427">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3428">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3428">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3429">10 siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3429">10 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3430">Sex siffror i formatet DDMMYY, som är födelsedatumet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3430">six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3431">ett bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3431">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3432">fyra siffror där den sista siffran är en bård</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3432">four digits where the final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3433">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3433">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3434">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3434">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3435">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3435">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3436">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3436">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3437">Det reguljära uttrycket Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3437">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3438">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_denmark_id hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3438">A keyword from Keyword_denmark_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3439">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3439">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3440">En DLP-princip har låg konfidens för att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3440">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3441">Det reguljära uttrycket Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3441">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3442">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3442">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="6c4f2fef-56e1-4c00-8093-88d7a01cf460" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_denmark_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="drug-enforcement-agency-dea-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3514">Dea-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3514">Drug Enforcement Agency (DEA) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3515">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3515">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3516">Två bokstäver följt av sju siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3516">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3517">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3517">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3518">Mönster måste omfatta alla följande:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3518">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3519">en bokstav (inte den här uppsättning möjliga bokstäver) från den här uppsättningen möjliga bokstäver: abcdefghjklmnprstux, som är en registrantkod</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3519">one letter (not case-sensitive) from this set of possible letters: abcdefghjklmnprstux, which is a registrant code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3520">en bokstav (inte fallkänslig), som är den första bokstaven i registrantens efternamn eller siffran "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3520">one letter (not case-sensitive), which is the first letter of the registrant's last name or digit '9'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3521">sju siffror, den sista är bårdsiffran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3521">seven digits, the last of which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3522">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3522">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3523">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3523">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3524">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3524">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3525">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3525">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3526">Funktionen Func_dea_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3526">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3527">Ett nyckelord `Keyword_dea_number` från hittas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3527">A keyword from `Keyword_dea_number` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3528">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3528">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3529">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3529">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3530">Funktionen Func_dea_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3530">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3531">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3531">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- DEA Number -->
    <Entity id="9a5445ad-406e-43eb-8bd7-cac17ab6d0e4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
      </Pattern>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.1207.000" maxEngineVersion="15.20.3134.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3135.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
    </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_dea_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3533">Keyword_dea_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3533">Keyword_dea_number</span></span>
