## <a name="estonia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3538">Estlands körkortsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3538">Estonia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3539">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3539">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3540">Två bokstäver följt av sex siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3540">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3541">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3541">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3542">Två bokstäver och sex siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3542">two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3543">bokstäverna "ET" (inte case-sensitive)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3543">the letters "ET" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3544">sex siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3544">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3545">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3545">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3546">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3546">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3547">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3547">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3548">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3548">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3549">Det reguljära  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3549">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3550">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` eller `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3550">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="51da8171-da70-4cc1-9d65-055a59ca4f83" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3680">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3680">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3681">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3681">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3682">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3682">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3683">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3683">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3684">11 siffror utan blanksteg och avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3684">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3685">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3685">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3686">11 siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3686">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3687">en siffra som motsvarar sex och ett sekel (udda nummer man, jämn kvinna; 1–2: 19:e talet; 3–4: 20:e talet; 5–6: 2000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3687">one digit that corresponds to sex and century of birth (odd number male, even number female; 1-2: 19th century; 3-4: 20th century; 5-6: 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3688">Sex siffror som motsvarar födelsedatumet (DSMMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3688">six digits that correspond to date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3689">Tre siffror som motsvarar ett serienummer som separerar personer som föds samma datum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3689">three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3690">en checksiffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3690">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3691">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3691">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3692">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3692">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3693">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3693">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3694">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3694">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3695">Funktionen hittar  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3695">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3696">Ett nyckelord  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3696">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3697">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3697">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3698">Funktionen hittar  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3698">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Personal Identification Code -->
      <Entity id="bfb26de6-dad5-4d48-ab72-4789cdd0654c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3731">Estland passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3731">Estonia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3732">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3732">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3733">en bokstav följt av sju siffror utan blanksteg eller avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3733">one letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3734">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3734">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3735">en bokstav följt av sju siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3735">one letter followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3736">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3736">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3737">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3737">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3738">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3738">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3739">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3739">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3740">Det reguljära  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3740">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3741">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3741">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3742">Det reguljära `Regex_eu_passport_date1` uttrycket hittar datum i formatet DD.MM.YYYY eller ett nyckelord från `Keywords_eu_passport_date` hittas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3742">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3743">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3743">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3744">Det reguljära  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3744">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3745">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3745">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="61f7073a-509e-425b-a754-bc01bb5d5b8c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="eu-debit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3763">BETALKORTSNUMMER (EU)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3763">EU debit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3764">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3764">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3765">16 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3765">16 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3766">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3766">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3767">Komplext och robust mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3767">Complex and robust pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3768">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3768">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3769">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3769">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3770">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3770">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3771">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3771">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3772">Funktionen för Func_eu_debit_card hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3772">The function Func_eu_debit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3773">Minst ett av följande stämmer:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3773">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3774">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_eu_debit_card hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3774">A keyword from Keyword_eu_debit_card is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3775">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_card_terms_dict hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3775">A keyword from Keyword_card_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3776">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_card_security_terms_dict hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3776">A keyword from Keyword_card_security_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3777">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3777">A keyword from Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3778">Funktionen Func_expiration_date hittar ett datum i rätt datumformat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3778">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3779">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3779">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- EU Debit Card Number -->
    <Entity id="0e9b3178-9678-47dd-a509-37222ca96b42" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_eu_debit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_eu_debit_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_security_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3780">Nyckelord</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3780">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_eu_debit_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3781">Keyword_eu_debit_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3781">Keyword_eu_debit_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-3782">kontonummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-3782">account number</span></span>

## <a name="finland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4226">Finlands körkortsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4226">Finland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4227">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4227">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4228">10 siffror som innehåller ett bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4228">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4229">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4229">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4230">10 siffror som innehåller ett bindestreck:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4230">10 digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4231">sex siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4231">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4232">ett bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4232">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4233">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4233">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4234">en siffra eller bokstav</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4234">a digit or letter</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4235">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4235">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4236">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4236">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4237">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4237">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4238">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4238">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4239">Det reguljära  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4239">The regular expression  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4240">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` eller `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4240">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Finland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="bb3b27a3-79bd-4ac4-81a7-f9fca3c7d1a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-european-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4371">Finlands hälsoförsäkringsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4371">Finland european health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4372">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4372">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4373">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4373">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4374">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4374">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4375">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4375">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4376">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4376">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4377">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4377">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4378">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4378">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4379">20-siffrigt nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4379">20-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4380">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4380">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4381">20-siffrigt nummer:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4381">20-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4382">10 siffror – 8024680246</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4382">10 digits - 8024680246</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4383">Ett valfritt blanksteg eller bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4383">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4384">10 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4384">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4385">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4385">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4386">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4386">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4387">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4387">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4388">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4388">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4389">Regex-Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4389">The regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4390">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4390">A keyword from Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland European Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="60f75aed-81bf-4625-89b0-0846b9248ee7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4408">Finlands national-ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4408">Finland national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4409">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4409">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4410">Sex siffror plus ett tecken som anger ett sekel plus tre siffror plus en bård</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4410">six digits plus a character indicating a century plus three digits plus a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4411">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4411">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4412">Mönster måste omfatta alla följande:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4412">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4413">Sex siffror i formatet DDMMYY, som är ett födelsedatum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4413">six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are a date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4414">talmarkör (antingen '-', '+' eller 'a')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4414">century marker (either '-', '+' or 'a')</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4415">tresiffrigt id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4415">three-digit personal identification number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4416">En siffra eller bokstav (tecken insensitiv) som är en kontrollsiffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4416">a digit or letter (case insensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4417">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4417">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4418">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4418">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4419">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4419">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4420">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4420">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4421">funktionen som Func_finnish_national_id hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4421">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4422">ett nyckelord från Keyword_finnish_national_id hittas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4422">a keyword from Keyword_finnish_national_id is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4423">kontrollsumma passeras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4423">the checksum passes</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4424">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4424">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4425">funktionen som Func_finnish_national_id hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4425">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4426">kontrollsumma passeras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4426">the checksum passes</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finnish National ID-->
      <Entity id="338FD995-4CB5-4F87-AD35-79BD1DD926C1" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4475">Finland passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4475">Finland passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4476">Den här typen av känslig information är tillgänglig i typen KÄNSLIG informationstyp EU Passport Number och är tillgänglig som en fristående typ av känslig information.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4476">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4477">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4477">Format</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4478">kombination av nio bokstäver och siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4478">combination of nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4479">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4479">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4480">kombination av nio bokstäver och siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4480">combination of nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4481">Två bokstäver (inte versaler och teckenkänsliga)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4481">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4482">sju siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4482">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4483">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4483">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4484">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4484">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4485">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4485">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4486">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4486">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4487">Det reguljära `Regex_finland_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4487">The regular expression `Regex_finland_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4488">Ett nyckelord från `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keyword_finland_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4488">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_finland_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4489">Det reguljära `Regex_eu_passport_date1` uttrycket hittar datum i formatet DD.MM.YYYY eller ett nyckelord från `Keywords_eu_passport_date` hittas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4489">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4490">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4490">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4491">Det reguljära `Regex_finland_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4491">The regular expression `Regex_finland_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4492">Ett nyckelord från `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keyword_finland_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4492">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_finland_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d1685ac3-1d3a-40f8-8198-32ef5669c7a5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4516">Frankrikes körkortsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4516">France driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4517">Den här typen av känslig information är tillgänglig i EU-drivrutinens licensnummerkänsliga informationstyp och är tillgänglig som en fristående typ av känslig information.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4517">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4518">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4518">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4519">12 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4519">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4520">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4520">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4521">12 siffror med validering för rabatt på liknande mönster som franska telefonnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4521">12 digits with validation to discount similar patterns such as French telephone numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4522">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4522">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4523">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4523">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4524">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4524">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4525">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4525">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4526">funktionen Func_french_drivers_license hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4526">the function Func_french_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4527">ett nyckelord från Keyword_french_drivers_license hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4527">a keyword from Keyword_french_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="18e55a36-a01b-4b0f-943d-dc10282a1824" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_french_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4654">Frankrikes hälsoförsäkringsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4654">France health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4655">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4655">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4656">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4656">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4657">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4657">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4658">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4658">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4659">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4659">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4660">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4660">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4661">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4661">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4662">21-siffrigt nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4662">21-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4663">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4663">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4664">21-siffrigt nummer:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4664">21-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4665">10 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4665">10 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4666">ett valfritt blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4666">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4667">10 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4667">10 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4668">ett valfritt blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4668">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4669">en siffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4669">a digit</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4670">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4670">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4671">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4671">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4672">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4672">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4673">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4673">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4674">regex-Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4674">the regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4675">ett nyckelord från Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4675">a keyword from Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="9bc2069e-76df-4ff9-ac02-2f519469e236" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4676">Nyckelord</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4676">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_france_health_insurance_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4677">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4677">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4678">insurance card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4678">insurance card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4679">carte vitale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4679">carte vitale</span></span>

## <a name="france-national-id-card-cni"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4681">France national id card (CNI)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4681">France national id card (CNI)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4682">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4682">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4683">12 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4683">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4684">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4684">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4685">12 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4685">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4686">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4686">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4687">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4687">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4688">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4688">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4689">En DLP-princip har låg konfidens för att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4689">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4690">Det reguljära uttrycket Regex_france_cni hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4690">The regular expression Regex_france_cni finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4691">Ett nyckelord från Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4691">A keyword from Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France CNI -->
    <Entity id="f741ac74-1bc0-4665-b69b-f0c7f927c0c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="65">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_france_cni" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4692">Nyckelord</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4692">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_france_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4693">Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4693">Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4694">kortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4694">card number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4696">carte nationale d'idenite no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4696">carte nationale d'idenite no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4697">cni #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4697">cni#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4698">cni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4698">cni</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4699">compte bancaire</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4699">compte bancaire</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4700">national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4700">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4701">national identity</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4701">national identity</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4702">nationalidno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4702">nationalidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4703">numéro d'assurance malakit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4703">numéro d'assurance maladie</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4704">numéro de carte vitale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4704">numéro de carte vitale</span></span>

   
## <a name="france-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4705">Frankrike passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4705">France passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4706">Den här typen av känslig information är tillgänglig i typen Känslig information av EU-passnummer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4706">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4707">Det är tillgängligt som en fristående typ av känslig information.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4707">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4708">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4708">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4709">Nio siffror och bokstäver</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4709">nine digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4710">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4710">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4711">Nio siffror och bokstäver:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4711">nine digits and letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4712">två siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4712">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4713">Två bokstäver (inte versaler och teckenkänsliga)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4713">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4714">fem siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4714">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4715">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4715">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4716">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4716">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4717">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4717">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4718">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4718">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4719">Funktionen hittar `Func_fr_passport` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4719">The function `Func_fr_passport` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4720">Ett nyckelord från `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4720">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4721">Det reguljära `Regex_eu_passport_date3` uttrycket hittar datum i formatet DD MM YYYY eller ett nyckelord från `Keywords_eu_passport_date` hittas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4721">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4722">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4722">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4723">Funktionen hittar `Func_fr_passport` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4723">The function `Func_fr_passport` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4724">Ett nyckelord från `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4724">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- France Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="3008b884-8c8c-4cd8-a289-99f34fc7ff5d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-social-security-number-insee"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4755">Frankrikes personnummer (INSEE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4755">France social security number (INSEE)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4756">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4756">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4757">15 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4757">15 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4758">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4758">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4759">Måste matcha ett av två mönster:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4759">Must match one of two patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4760">13 siffror följt av ett blanksteg följt av två siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4760">13 digits followed by a space followed by two digits</span></span><br/>
<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4761">eller</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4761">or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4762">15 siffror i följd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4762">15 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4763">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4763">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4764">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4764">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4765">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4765">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4766">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4766">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4767">Funktionen hittar `Func_french_insee` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4767">The function `Func_french_insee` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4768">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_fr_insee hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4768">A keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4769">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4769">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4770">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4770">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4771">Funktionen Func_french_insee eller Func_fr_insee hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4771">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4772">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4772">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France INSEE -->
    <Entity id="71f62b97-efe0-4aa1-aa49-e14de253619d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4773">Nyckelord</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4773">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_fr_insee"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4774">Keyword_fr_insee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4774">Keyword_fr_insee</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4775">code sécu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4775">code sécu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4776">d'identité nationale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4776">d'identité nationale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4777">insee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4777">insee</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4778">fssn #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4778">fssn#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4779">le numéro d'identification nationale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4779">le numéro d'identification nationale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4780">le code de la sécurité sociale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4780">le code de la sécurité sociale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4781">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4781">national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4782">national identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4782">national identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4783">no d'identité</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4783">no d'identité</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4784">Nej.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4784">no.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4785">d'identité</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4785">d'identité</span></span>

## <a name="france-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4803">Frankrikes skattenummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4803">France tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4804">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4804">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4805">13 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4805">13 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4806">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4806">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4807">13 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4807">13 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4808">En siffra som måste vara 0, 1, 2 eller 3</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4808">One digit that must be 0, 1, 2, or 3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4809">En siffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4809">One digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4810">Ett blanksteg (valfritt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4810">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4811">Två siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4811">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4812">Ett blanksteg (valfritt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4812">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4813">Tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4813">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4814">Ett blanksteg (valfritt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4814">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4815">Tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4815">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4816">Ett blanksteg (valfritt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4816">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4817">Tre kontrollsiffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4817">Three check digits</span></span> 

  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4818">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4818">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4819">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4819">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4820">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4820">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4821">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4821">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4822">Funktionen hittar  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4822">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4823">Ett nyckelord  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4823">A keyword from  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4824">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4824">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4825">Funktionen hittar  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4825">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- France Tax Identification Number (numéro SPI.) -->
      <Entity id="ed59e77e-171d-442c-9ec1-88e2ebcb5b0a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4832">tax no #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4832">tax no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4833">tax no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4833">tax no</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4837">taxidno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4837">taxidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4838">taxidnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4838">taxidnumber#</span></span>

## <a name="france-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4845">Värdeskattenummer för Frankrike</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4845">France value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4846">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4846">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4847">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4847">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4848">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4848">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4849">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4849">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4850">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4850">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4851">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4851">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4852">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4852">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4853">Alfanumeriskt mönster med 13 tecken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4853">13 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4854">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4854">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4855">13 tecken för alfanumeriskt mönster:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4855">13 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4856">två bokstäver – FR (teckenkänsligt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4856">two letters  - FR (case insensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4857">Ett valfritt blanksteg eller bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4857">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4858">två bokstäver eller siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4858">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4859">Ett valfritt blanksteg, punkt, bindestreck eller kommatecken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4859">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4860">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4860">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4861">Ett valfritt blanksteg, punkt, bindestreck eller kommatecken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4861">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4862">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4862">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4863">Ett valfritt blanksteg, punkt, bindestreck eller kommatecken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4863">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4864">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4864">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4865">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4865">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4866">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4866">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4867">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4867">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4868">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4868">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4869">Funktionen för Func_france_value_added_tax_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4869">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4870">Ett nyckelord från Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4870">A keyword from Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4871">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4871">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4872">Funktionen för Func_france_value_added_tax_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4872">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="949121e6-ad9f-4379-8731-710342baea78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4885">Tysklands körkortsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4885">Germany driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4886">Den här typen av känslig information ingår i EU:s typ av licensnummer för känslig information.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4886">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4887">Det är tillgängligt som en fristående typ av känslig information.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4887">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4888">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4888">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4889">kombination av 11 siffror och bokstäver</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4889">combination of 11 digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4890">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4890">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4891">11 siffror och bokstäver (inte teckenkänsliga):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4891">11 digits and letters (not case-sensitive):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4892">en siffra eller bokstav</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4892">a digit or letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4893">två siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4893">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4894">Sex siffror eller bokstäver</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4894">six digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4895">en siffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4895">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4896">en siffra eller bokstav</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4896">a digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4897">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4897">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4898">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4898">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4899">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4899">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4900">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4900">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4901">Funktionen för Func_german_drivers_license hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4901">The function Func_german_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4902">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_german_drivers_license_number hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4902">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-4903">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-4903">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="91da9335-1edb-45b7-a95f-5fe41a16c63c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5052">Identitetskortsnummer i Tyskland</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5052">Germany identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5053">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5053">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5054">sedan 1 november 2010: nio bokstäver och siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5054">since 1 November 2010: Nine letters and digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5055">från 1 april 1987 till 31 oktober 2010: 10 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5055">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010: 10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5056">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5056">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5057">sedan 1 november 2010:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5057">since 1 November 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5058">en bokstav (inte en ärendekänslig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5058">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5059">åtta siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5059">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5060">från den 1 april 1987 till den 31 oktober 2010:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5060">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5061">10 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5061">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5062">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5062">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5063">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5063">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5064">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5064">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5065">En DLP-princip har låg konfidens för att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5065">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5066">Det reguljära uttrycket Regex_germany_id_card hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5066">The regular expression Regex_germany_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5067">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_germany_id_card hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5067">A keyword from Keyword_germany_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="e577372f-c42e-47a0-9d85-bebed1c237d4" recommendedConfidence="65" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_germany_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_germany_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5068">Nyckelord</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5068">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_germany_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5069">Keyword_germany_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5069">Keyword_germany_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5070">aus denisys</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5070">ausweis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5071">gpid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5071">gpid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5072">identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5072">identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5073">identifikation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5073">identifikation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5074">identifizierungsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5074">identifizierungsnummer</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5076">identitetsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5076">identity number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5079">personalaus en</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5079">personalausweis</span></span>
