- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5081">persönliche identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5081">persönliche identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5082">persönliche-id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5082">persönliche-id-nummer</span></span>


## <a name="germany-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5083">Tyskland passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5083">Germany passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5084">Den här typen av känslig information ingår i typen Känslig information i EU Passport Number och är tillgänglig som en fristående typ av känslig information.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5084">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5085">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5085">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5086">10 siffror eller bokstäver</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5086">10 digits or letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5087">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5087">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5088">Mönster måste omfatta alla följande:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5088">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5089">det första tecknet är en siffra eller en bokstav från denna uppsättning (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5089">first character is a digit or a letter from this set (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5090">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5090">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5091">Fem siffror eller bokstäver från denna uppsättning (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5091">five digits or letters from this set (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5092">en siffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5092">a digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5093">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5093">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5094">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5094">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5095">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5095">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5096">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5096">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5097">Funktionen för Func_german_passport hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5097">The function Func_german_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5098">Ett nyckelord från `Keyword_german_passport` eller `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5098">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5099">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5099">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5100">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5100">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5101">Funktionen för Func_german_passport_data hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5101">The function Func_german_passport_data finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5102">Ett nyckelord från `Keyword_german_passport` eller `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5102">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5103">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5103">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="2e3da144-d42b-47ed-b123-fbf78604e52c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport_data" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5126">Tysklands skatteidentifieringsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5126">Germany tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5127">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5127">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5128">11 siffror utan blanksteg och avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5128">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5129">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5129">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5130">11 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5130">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5131">Två siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5131">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5132">Ett valfritt blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5132">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5133">Tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5133">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5134">Ett valfritt blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5134">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5135">Tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5135">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5136">Ett valfritt blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5136">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5137">Två siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5137">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5138">en checksiffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5138">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5139">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5139">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5140">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5140">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5141">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5141">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5142">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5142">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5143">Funktionen hittar  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5143">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5144">Ett nyckelord  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5144">A keyword from  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5145">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5145">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5146">Funktionen hittar  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5146">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    

## <a name="germany-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5172">Momsnummer för Tyskland</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5172">Germany value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5173">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5173">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5174">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5174">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5175">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5175">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5176">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5176">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5177">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5177">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5178">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5178">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5179">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5179">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5180">Alfanumeriskt mönster med 11 tecken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5180">11 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5181">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5181">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5182">Alfanumeriskt mönster med 11 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5182">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5183">a bokstaven D eller d</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5183">a letter D or d</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5184">ett bokstaven E eller e</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5184">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5185">ett valfritt blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5185">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5186">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5186">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5187">Ett valfritt blanksteg eller kommatecken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5187">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5188">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5188">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5189">Ett valfritt blanksteg eller kommatecken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5189">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5190">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5190">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5191">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5191">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5192">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5192">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5193">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5193">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5194">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5194">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5195">Funktionen för Func_germany_value_added_tax_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5195">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5196">Ett nyckelord från Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5196">A keyword from Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5197">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5197">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5198">Funktionen för Func_germany_value_added_tax_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5198">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Germany Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="db177eb2-8811-4842-bffc-128c14aa219f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5208">Greklands körkortsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5208">Greece driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5209">Den här typen av känslig information ingår i EU-drivrutinens typ av licensnummerkänslig information och är tillgänglig som en fristående typ av känslig information.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5209">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5210">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5210">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5211">Nio siffror utan blanksteg och avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5211">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5212">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5212">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5213">nio siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5213">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5214">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5214">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5215">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5215">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5216">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5216">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5217">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5217">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5218">Det reguljära  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5218">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5219">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` eller `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5219">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greece Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="7a2200b5-aacf-4e3c-ab36-136d3e68b7da" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-national-id-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5345">Greklands nationella ID-kort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5345">Greece national ID card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5346">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5346">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5347">Kombination av 7–8 bokstäver och siffror plus ett streck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5347">Combination of 7-8 letters and numbers plus a dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5348">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5348">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5349">Sju bokstäver och siffror (gammalt format):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5349">Seven letters and numbers (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5350">En bokstav (valfri bokstav i det grekiska alfabetet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5350">One letter (any letter of the Greek alphabet)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5351">Ett streck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5351">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5352">Sex siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5352">Six digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5353">Åtta bokstäver och siffror (nytt format):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5353">Eight letters and numbers (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5354">Två bokstäver med versaler både i det grekiska och det latinska alfabetet (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5354">Two letters whose uppercase character occurs in both the Greek and Latin alphabets (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5355">Ett streck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5355">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5356">Sex siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5356">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5357">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5357">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5358">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5358">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5359">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5359">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5360">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5360">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5361">Det reguljära uttrycket Regex_greece_id_card hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5361">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5362">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_greece_id_card hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5362">A keyword from Keyword_greece_id_card is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5363">En DLP-princip har låg konfidens för att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5363">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5364">Det reguljära uttrycket Regex_greece_id_card hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5364">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Greece National ID Card -->
      <Entity id="82568215-1da1-46d3-874a-d2294d81b5ac" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5365">Nyckelord</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5365">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_greece_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5366">Keyword_greece_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5366">Keyword_greece_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5367">grekiska id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5367">greek id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5368">grekiska national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5368">greek national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5369">grekiska personliga ID-kort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5369">greek personal id card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5370">grekiska police id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5370">greek police id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5371">identitetskort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5371">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5372">tautotita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5372">tautotita</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5373">ταυτότητα</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5373">ταυτότητα</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5374">ταυτότητας</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5374">ταυτότητας</span></span>


## <a name="greece-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5375">Greklands passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5375">Greece passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5376">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5376">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5377">Två bokstäver följt av sju siffror utan blanksteg eller avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5377">Two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5378">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5378">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5379">Två bokstäver följt av sju siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5379">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5380">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5380">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5381">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5381">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5382">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5382">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5383">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5383">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5384">Det reguljära  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5384">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5385">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5385">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5386">Det reguljära uttrycket hittar datum i `Regex_greece_eu_passport_date` formatet DD MMM YY (Exempel - 28 augusti 19) eller ett `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date` nyckelord från hittas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5386">The regular expression `Regex_greece_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM YY (Example - 28 Aug 19) or a keyword from `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5387">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5387">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5388">Det reguljära  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5388">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5389">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5389">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greece Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7e65eb47-cdf9-4f52-8f90-2a27d5ee67e3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5405">αριθμός διαβατηριο</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5405">αριθμός διαβατηριο</span></span>


## <a name="greece-social-security-number-amka"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5406">Greklands social securitynummer (AMKA)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5406">Greece Social Security Number (AMKA)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5407">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5407">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5408">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5408">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5409">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5409">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5410">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5410">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5411">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5411">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5412">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5412">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5413">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5413">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5414">Elva siffror utan blanksteg och avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5414">Eleven digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5415">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5415">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5416">6 siffror som födelsedatum YYMMDD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5416">6 digits as date of birth YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5417">4 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5417">4 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5418">en kontrollsiffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5418">a check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5419">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5419">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5420">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5420">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5421">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5421">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5422">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5422">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5423">Funktionen hittar  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5423">The function  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5424">Ett nyckelord  `Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5424">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5425">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5425">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5426">Funktionen hittar  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5426">The function  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Greece Social Security Number (AMKA) -->
      <Entity id="e39b03f4-50ea-41ae-af7a-a4b9539596ad" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_greece_eu_ssn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_greece_eu_ssn" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5436">Αριθμού Μητρώου Κοινωνικής Ασφάλισης</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5436">Αριθμού Μητρώου Κοινωνικής Ασφάλισης</span></span>


## <a name="greece-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5437">Greklands skatteidentifieringsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5437">Greece tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5438">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5438">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5439">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5439">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5440">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5440">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5441">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5441">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5442">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5442">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5443">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5443">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5444">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5444">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5445">Nio siffror utan blanksteg och avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5445">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5446">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5446">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5447">Nio siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5447">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5448">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5448">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5449">Ej tillämpligt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5449">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5450">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5450">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5451">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5451">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5452">Det reguljära  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5452">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5453">Ett nyckelord  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5453">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greek Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="15a54a5a-53d4-4080-ad43-a2a4fe1d3bf7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hong-kong-identity-card-hkid-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5482">Hongkong identitetskort (HKID) nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5482">Hong Kong identity card (HKID) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5483">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5483">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5484">Kombination av 8–9 bokstäver och siffror samt valfria parenteser runt det sista tecknet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5484">Combination of 8-9 letters and numbers plus optional parentheses around the final character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5485">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5485">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5486">Kombination av 8–9 bokstäver:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5486">Combination of 8-9 letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5487">1–2 bokstäver (inte teckenkänsliga)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5487">1-2 letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5488">Sex siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5488">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5489">Det sista tecknet (valfri siffra eller bokstaven A), som är en kontrollsiffra och som kan omges av parenteser.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5489">The final character (any digit or the letter A), which is the check digit and is optionally enclosed in parentheses.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5490">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5490">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5491">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5491">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5492">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5492">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5493">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5493">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5494">Funktionen för Func_hong_kong_id_card hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5494">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5495">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_hong_kong_id_card hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5495">A keyword from Keyword_hong_kong_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5496">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5496">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5497">En DLP-princip har låg konfidens för att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5497">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5498">Funktionen för Func_hong_kong_id_card hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5498">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5499">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5499">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Hong Kong Identity Card (HKID) number -->
<Entity id="e63c28a7-ad29-4c17-a41a-3d2a0b70fd9c" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5539">Ungerns körkortsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5539">Hungary driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5540">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5540">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5541">Två bokstäver följt av sex siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5541">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5542">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5542">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5543">Två bokstäver och sex siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5543">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5544">Två bokstäver (inte versaler och teckenkänsliga)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5544">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5545">Sex siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5545">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5546">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5546">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5547">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5547">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5548">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5548">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5549">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5549">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5550">Det reguljära  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5550">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5551">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` eller `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5551">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <Entity id="9d31c46b-6e6b-444c-aeb1-6dd7e604bb24" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5676">Ungerns personliga ID-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5676">Hungary personal identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5677">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5677">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5678">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5678">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5679">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5679">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5680">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5680">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5681">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5681">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5682">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5682">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5683">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5683">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5684">11 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5684">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5685">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5685">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5686">11 siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5686">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5687">En siffra som motsvarar kön (1-man, 2-kvinna, andra siffror är också möjliga för människor som föddes före 1900 eller för att människor med dubbel kön)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5687">One digit that corresponds to gender (1-male, 2-female, other numbers are also possible for citizens born before 1900 or citizens with double citizenship)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5688">Sex siffror som motsvarar födelsedatum (AMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5688">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5689">Tre siffror som motsvarar ett serienummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5689">Three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5690">En kontrollsiffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5690">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5691">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5691">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5692">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5692">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5693">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5693">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5694">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5694">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5695">Funktionen hittar  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5695">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5696">Ett nyckelord  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5696">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5697">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5697">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5698">Funktionen hittar  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5698">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="7b5cc218-7046-47d9-80c9-f325b50896ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5699">Nyckelord</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5699">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5700">Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5700">Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5701">id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5701">id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5702">identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5702">identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5703">sz ig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5703">sz ig</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5704">sz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5704">sz.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5705">ig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5705">ig.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5706">sz.ig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5706">sz.ig.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5707">személyazonosító igamévány</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5707">személyazonosító igazolvány</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5708">személyi igaávány</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5708">személyi igazolvány</span></span>


## <a name="hungary-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5709">Ungern passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5709">Hungary passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5710">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5710">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5711">Två bokstäver följt av sex eller sju siffror utan blanksteg eller avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5711">Two letters followed by six or seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5712">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5712">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5713">Två bokstäver följt av sex eller sju siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5713">Two letters followed by six or seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5714">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5714">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5715">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5715">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5716">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5716">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5717">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5717">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5718">Det reguljära  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5718">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5719">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5719">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5720">Det reguljära uttrycket hittar datum i `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date` formatet DD MMM/MMM YY (Exempel - 01 MÁR/MAR 12) eller ett nyckelord från `Keywords_eu_passport_date` hittas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5720">The regular expression `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format  DD MMM/MMM YY (Example - 01 MÁR/MAR 12) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5721">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5721">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5722">Det reguljära  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5722">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5723">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5723">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="5b483910-9aa7-4c99-9917-f4001464bda7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-social-security-number-taj"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5743">Ungerns social security number (TAJ)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5743">Hungary social security number (TAJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5744">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5744">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5745">Nio siffror utan blanksteg och avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5745">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5746">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5746">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5747">Nio siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5747">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5748">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5748">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5749">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5749">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5750">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5750">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5751">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5751">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5752">Funktionen hittar  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5752">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5753">Ett nyckelord  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5753">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5754">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5754">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5755">Funktionen hittar  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5755">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Social Security Number (TAJ) -->
      <Entity id="0de78315-9537-47f5-95ab-b3e77eba3993" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5775">Ungerns skatteidentifieringsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5775">Hungary tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5776">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5776">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5777">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5777">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5778">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5778">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5779">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5779">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5780">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5780">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5781">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5781">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5782">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5782">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5783">10 siffror utan blanksteg eller avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5783">10 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5784">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5784">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5785">10 siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5785">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5786">En siffra som måste vara "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5786">One digit that must be "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5787">Åtta siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5787">Eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5788">En kontrollsiffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5788">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5789">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5789">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5790">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5790">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5791">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5791">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5792">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5792">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5793">Funktionen hittar  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5793">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5794">Ett nyckelord  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5794">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5795">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5795">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5796">Funktionen hittar  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5796">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="ede42eb4-59d9-49eb-9603-d7853fbda91d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5829">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5829">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5830">10 tecken för alfanumeriskt mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5830">10 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5831">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5831">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5832">10 tecken för alfanumeriskt mönster:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5832">10 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5833">två bokstäver – HU eller hu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5833">two letters - HU or hu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5834">valfritt blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5834">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5835">åtta siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5835">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5836">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5836">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5837">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5837">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5838">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5838">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5839">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5839">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5840">Funktionen Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5840">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5841">Ett nyckelord från Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5841">A keyword from Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5842">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5842">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5843">Funktionen Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5843">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="976349a0-683b-477a-90f8-ff0a220d5592" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5849">vatno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5849">vatno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5850">ungerskavatno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5850">hungarianvatno#</span></span>

## <a name="india-permanent-account-number-pan"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5857">Indiens permanenta kontonummer (PAN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5857">India permanent account number (PAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5858">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5858">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5859">10 bokstäver eller siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5859">10 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5860">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5860">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5861">10 bokstäver eller siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5861">10 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5862">Tre bokstäver (inte teckenkänsliga)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5862">Three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5863">En bokstav i C, P, H, F, A, T, B, L, J, G (inte ärendekänsligt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5863">A letter in C, P, H, F, A, T, B, L, J, G (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5864">En bokstav</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5864">A letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5865">Fyra siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5865">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5866">En bokstav med en alfabetisk kontrollsiffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5866">A letter that is an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5867">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5867">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5868">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5868">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5869">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5869">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5870">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5870">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5871">Det reguljära uttrycket Regex_india_permanent_account_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5871">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5872">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_india_permanent_account_number hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5872">A keyword from Keyword_india_permanent_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5873">En DLP-princip har låg konfidens för att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5873">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5874">Det reguljära uttrycket Regex_india_permanent_account_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5874">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- India Permanent Account Number -->
      <Entity id="2602bfee-9bb0-47a5-a7a6-2bf3053e2804" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_india_permanent_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3520.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_india_permanent_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5876">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5876">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5877">Permanent kontonummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5877">Permanent Account Number</span></span>

## <a name="india-unique-identification-aadhaar-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5879">Indiens unika ID-nummer (Aadhaar)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5879">India unique identification (Aadhaar) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5880">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5880">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5881">12 siffror som innehåller valfria blanksteg eller streck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5881">12 digits containing optional spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5882">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5882">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5883">12 siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5883">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5884">En siffra som inte är 0 eller 1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5884">A digit which is not 0 or 1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5885">Tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5885">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5886">Ett blanksteg eller streck (valfritt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5886">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5887">Fyra siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5887">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5888">Ett blanksteg eller streck (valfritt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5888">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5889">Den sista siffran, som är kontrollsiffran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5889">The final digit, which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5890">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5890">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5891">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5891">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5892">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5892">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5893">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5893">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5894">Funktionen för Func_india_aadhaar hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5894">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5895">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_india_aadhar hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5895">A keyword from Keyword_india_aadhar is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5896">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5896">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- 
<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5897">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5897">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5898">Funktionen för Func_india_aadhaar hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5898">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5899">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5899">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Unique Identification (Aadhaar) number -->
<Entity id="1ca46b29-76f5-4f46-9383-cfa15e91048f" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_aadhar"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
