## <a name="indonesia-identity-card-ktp-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5908">Indonesia Identity Card-nummer (KTP)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5908">Indonesia identity card (KTP) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5909">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5909">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5910">16 siffror med valfria punkter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5910">16 digits containing optional periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5911">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5911">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5912">16 siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5912">16 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5913">Tvåsiffrig provinskod</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5913">Two-digit province code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5914">En punkt (valfritt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5914">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5915">Tvåsiffrig regency eller ortkod</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5915">Two-digit regency or city code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5916">Tvåsiffrig underpriskod</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5916">Two-digit subdistrict code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5917">En punkt (valfritt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5917">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5918">Sex siffror i formatet DDMMYY, som är födelsedatumet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5918">Six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5919">En punkt (valfritt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5919">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5920">Fyra siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5920">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5921">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5921">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5922">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5922">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5923">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5923">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5924">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5924">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5925">Det reguljära uttrycket Regex_indonesia_id_card hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5925">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5926">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_indonesia_id_card hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5926">A keyword from Keyword_indonesia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Indonesia Identity Card (KTP) Number -->
<Entity id="da68fdb0-f383-4981-8c86-82689d3b7d55" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_indonesia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_indonesia_id_card"/>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5927">Nyckelord</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5927">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_indonesia_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5928">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5928">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5931">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5931">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span></span> 
   
## <a name="international-banking-account-number-iban"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5932">Nummer för internationella banktjänster (IBAN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5932">International banking account number (IBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5933">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5933">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5934">Landskod (två bokstäver) plus kontrollera siffror (två siffror) plus bban-nummer (upp till 30 tecken)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5934">Country code (two letters) plus check digits (two digits) plus bban number (up to 30 characters)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5935">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5935">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5936">Mönster måste omfatta alla följande:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5936">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5937">Landskod med två bokstäver</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5937">Two-letter country code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5938">Två kontrollsiffror (följt av ett valfritt blanksteg)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5938">Two check digits (followed by an optional space)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5939">1–7 grupper med fyra bokstäver eller siffror (kan avgränsas med blanksteg)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5939">1-7 groups of four letters or digits (can be separated by spaces)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5940">1–3 bokstäver eller siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5940">1-3 letters or digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5941">Formatet skiljer sig åt mellan olika länder.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5941">The format for each country is slightly different.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5942">IBAN-typen för känslig information omfattar dessa 60 länder:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5942">The IBAN sensitive information type covers these 60 countries:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5943">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, ch, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mt, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk , sm, tn, tr, vg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5943">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5944">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5944">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5945">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5945">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5946">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5946">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5947">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5947">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5948">Funktionen Func_iban hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5948">The function Func_iban finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5949">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5949">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="e7dc4711-11b7-4cb0-b88b-2c394a771f0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_iban" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5950">Nyckelord</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5950">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5951">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5951">None</span></span>

   
## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-10-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5952">Internationell klassificering av den internationella klassificeringen (ICD-10-CM)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5952">International classification of diseases (ICD-10-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5953">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5953">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5954">Ordlista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5954">Dictionary</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5956">Nyckelord</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5956">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5957">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5957">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5958">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5958">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5959">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5959">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5960">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5960">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5961">Ett nyckelord från Dictionary_icd_10_updated hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5961">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5962">Ett nyckelord från Dictionary_icd_10_codes hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5962">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5963">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5963">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5964">Ett nyckelord från Dictionary_icd_10_ har uppdaterats hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5964">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_ updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- ICD-10 CM -->
      <Entity id="3356946c-6bb7-449b-b253-6ffa419c0ce7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
        </Pattern>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5965">Nyckelord</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5965">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5966">Valfri term från nyckelordsordlistan i Dictionary_icd_10_updated, som baseras på den internationella klassificeringen av den internationella klassificeringen, den tionde revisionen, den kliniskt [modifieringen (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5966">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5967">Den här typen söker bara efter termen, inte för försäkringskoderna.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5967">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5968">Valfri term från nyckelordsordlistan i Dictionary_icd_10_codes, som baseras på den internationella klassificeringen av ärevisionen, tionde revision, klinisk ändring [(ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5968">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5969">Den här typen söker bara efter försäkringskoder, inte beskrivningen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5969">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5984">Valfri term från nyckelordsordlistan i Dictionary_icd_9_updated, som baseras på den internationella klassificeringen av det här ordet, den nionde revisionen, den kliniskt [modifieringen (ICD-9-CM).](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5984">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5985">Den här typen söker bara efter termen, inte för försäkringskoderna.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5985">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5986">Valfri term från Dictionary_icd_9_codes ordlistan, som baseras på den internationella klassificeringen av ärevisionen, den nionde revisionen, den kliniskt [modifieringen (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5986">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5987">Den här typen söker bara efter försäkringskoder, inte beskrivningen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5987">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="ip-address"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5988">IP-adress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5988">IP address</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5989">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5989">Format</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv4"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5990">IPv4:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5990">IPv4:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5991">Komplext mönster som konton för formaterade (punkter) och oformaterade (inga perioder) versioner av IPv4-adresser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5991">Complex pattern that accounts for formatted (periods) and unformatted (no periods) versions of the IPv4 addresses</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv6"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5992">IPv6:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5992">IPv6:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5993">Komplext mönster som står för formaterade IPv6-tal (som innehåller kolon)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5993">Complex pattern that accounts for formatted IPv6 numbers (which include colons)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5994">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5994">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5995">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5995">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5996">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5996">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5997">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5997">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5998">För IPv6 har en DLP-princip med hög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5998">For IPv6, a DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-5999">Det reguljära uttrycket Regex_ipv6_address hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-5999">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6000">Inget nyckelord från Keyword_ipaddress hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6000">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6001">För IPv4 har en DLP-princip med hög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6001">For IPv4, a DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6002">Det reguljära uttrycket Regex_ipv4_address hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6002">The regular expression Regex_ipv4_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6003">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_ipaddress hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6003">A keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6004">För IPv6 har en DLP-princip med hög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6004">For IPv6, a DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6005">Det reguljära uttrycket Regex_ipv6_address hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6005">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6006">Inget nyckelord från Keyword_ipaddress hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6006">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- IP Address -->
    <Entity id="1daa4ad5-e2dd-4ca4-a788-54722c09efb2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv4_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6014">Irlands körkortsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6014">Ireland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6015">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6015">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6016">Sex siffror följt av fyra bokstäver</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6016">Six digits followed by four letters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6017">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6017">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6018">Sex siffror och fyra bokstäver:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6018">Six digits and four letters:</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6021">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6021">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6022">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6022">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6023">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6023">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6024">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6024">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6025">Det reguljära  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6025">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6026">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` eller `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6026">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Ireland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="e01bccd9-eb4d-414f-ace1-e9b6a4c4a2ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6150">Irland, passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6150">Ireland passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6151">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6151">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6152">Två bokstäver eller siffror följt av sju siffror utan blanksteg eller avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6152">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6153">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6153">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6154">Två bokstäver eller siffror följt av sju siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6154">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6155">Två siffror eller bokstäver (inte teckenkänsliga)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6155">Two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6156">Sju siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6156">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6157">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6157">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6158">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6158">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6159">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6159">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6160">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6160">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6161">Det reguljära  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6161">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6162">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6162">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6163">Det reguljära uttrycket hittar datum i formatet `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Exempel - 01 BEA/MAJ 1988) eller ett nyckelord från `Keywords_eu_passport_date` hittas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6163">The regular expression `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 01 BEA/MAY 1988) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6164">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6164">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6165">Det reguljära  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6165">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6166">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6166">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Ireland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="a2130f27-9ee2-4103-84f9-a6b1ee7d0cbf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-personal-public-service-pps-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6190">PpS-nummer (Personal Public Service) för Irland</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6190">Ireland personal public service (PPS) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6191">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6191">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6192">Gammalt format (till 31 december 2012):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6192">Old format (until 31 December 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6193">sju siffror följt av 1–2 bokstäver</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6193">seven digits followed by 1-2 letters</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6194">Nytt format (1 januari 2013 och senare):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6194">New format (1 January 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6195">sju siffror följt av två bokstäver</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6195">seven digits followed by two letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6196">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6196">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6197">Gammalt format (till 31 december 2012):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6197">Old format (until 31 December 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6198">sju siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6198">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6199">En till två bokstäver (inte teckenkänsligt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6199">one to two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6200">Nytt format (1 januari 2013 och senare):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6200">New format (1 January 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6201">sju siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6201">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6202">En bokstav (inte en teckenkänslig) som är en alfabetisk kontrollsiffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6202">a letter (not case-sensitive) which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6203">En valfri bokstav i cellområdet A-I eller "W"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6203">An optional letter in the range A-I, or “W”</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6204">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6204">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6205">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6205">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6206">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6206">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6207">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6207">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6208">Funktionen för Func_ireland_pps hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6208">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6209">Ett nyckelord från Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6209">A keyword from Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6210">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6210">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6211">En DLP-princip har låg konfidens för att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6211">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6212">Funktionen för Func_ireland_pps hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6212">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6213">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6213">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ireland Personal Public Service (PPS) Number -->
      <Entity id="1cdb674d-c19a-4fcf-9f4b-7f56cc87345a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="israel-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6258">Bankkontonummer för Israel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6258">Israel bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6259">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6259">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6260">13 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6260">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6261">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6261">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6262">Formaterat:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6262">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6263">två siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6263">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6264">ett streck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6264">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6265">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6265">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6266">ett streck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6266">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6267">åtta siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6267">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6268">Oformaterat:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6268">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6269">13 siffror i följd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6269">13 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6270">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6270">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6271">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6271">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6272">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6272">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6273">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6273">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6274">Det reguljära uttrycket Regex_israel_bank_account_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6274">The regular expression Regex_israel_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6275">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_israel_bank_account_number hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6275">A keyword from Keyword_israel_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="7d08b2ff-a0b9-437f-957c-aeddbf9b2b25" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_israel_bank_account_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_israel_bank_account_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="israel-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6282">Israels national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6282">Israel national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6283">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6283">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6284">nio siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6284">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6285">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6285">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6286">nio siffror i följd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6286">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6287">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6287">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6288">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6288">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6289">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6289">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6290">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6290">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6291">Funktionen för Func_israeli_national_id_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6291">The function Func_israeli_national_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6292">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_Israel_National_ID hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6292">A keyword from Keyword_Israel_National_ID is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6293">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6293">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel National ID Number -->
<Entity id="e05881f5-1db1-418c-89aa-a3ac5c5277ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_israeli_national_id_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Israel_National_ID" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6312">Italiens körkortsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6312">Italy driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6313">Den här typen av känslig information ingår i EU-drivrutinens typ av licensnummerkänslig information och är tillgänglig som en fristående typ av känslig information.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6313">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6314">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6314">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6315">en kombination av 10 bokstäver och siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6315">a combination of 10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6316">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6316">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6317">en kombination av 10 bokstäver och siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6317">a combination of 10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6318">en bokstav (inte en ärendekänslig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6318">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6319">bokstaven "A" eller "V" (inte ärendekänsligt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6319">the letter "A" or "V" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6320">sju siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6320">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6321">en bokstav (inte en ärendekänslig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6321">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6322">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6322">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6323">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6323">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6324">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6324">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6325">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6325">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6326">Det reguljära `Regex_italy_drivers_license_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6326">The regular expression `Regex_italy_drivers_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6327">Ett nyckelord från `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` eller `Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6327">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Italy Driver's license Number -->
    <Entity id="97d6244f-9157-41bd-8e0c-9d669a5c4d71" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_drivers_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-fiscal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6454">Italiens räkenskapskod</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6454">Italy fiscal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6455">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6455">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6456">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6456">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6457">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6457">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6458">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6458">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6459">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6459">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6460">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6460">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6461">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6461">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6462">En kombination av bokstäver och siffror på 16 tecken i det angivna mönstret</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6462">a 16-character combination of letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6463">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6463">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6464">En kombination av 16 tecken och siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6464">A 16-character combination of letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6465">Tre bokstäver som motsvarar de tre första konsonanterna i familjenamnet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6465">three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6466">Tre bokstäver som motsvarar den första, tredje och fjärde konsonanterna i förnamnet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6466">three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6467">två siffror som motsvarar de sista siffrorna i födelsedatumet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6467">two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6468">en bokstav som motsvarar bokstaven för födelsedatumet – bokstäver används i alfabetisk ordning, men bara bokstäverna A till E, H, L, M, P, R till T används (så januari är A och oktober är R)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6468">one letter that corresponds to the letter for the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (so, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6469">Två siffror som motsvarar dagen i månaden – för att skilja på kön läggs 40 till för kvinnor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6469">two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth—in order to differentiate between genders, 40 is added to the day of birth for women</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6470">fyra siffror som motsvarar den specifika areakoden för den valuta som personen är föds på (landskoder används för externa länder)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6470">four digits that correspond to the area code specific to the municipality where the person was born (country-wide codes are used for foreign countries)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6471">en paritetssiffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6471">one parity digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6472">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6472">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6473">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6473">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6474">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6474">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6475">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6475">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6476">Funktionen hittar  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6476">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6477">Ett nyckelord  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6477">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6478">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6478">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6479">Funktionen hittar  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6479">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Fiscal Code -->
      <Entity id="4cd79172-8da9-4ff5-9188-98b1e7e2eca6" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6514">Italien passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6514">Italy passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6515">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6515">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6516">två bokstäver eller siffror följt av sju siffror utan blanksteg eller avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6516">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6517">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6517">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6518">Två bokstäver eller siffror följt av sju siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6518">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6519">två siffror eller bokstäver (inte teckenkänsliga)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6519">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6520">sju siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6520">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6521">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6521">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6522">ej tillämpligt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6522">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6523">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6523">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6524">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6524">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6525">Det reguljära  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6525">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6526">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6526">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6527">Det reguljära uttrycket hittar datum i formatet `Regex_italy_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Exempel - 01 GEN/JAN 1988) eller ett nyckelord från `Keywords_eu_passport_date` hittas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6527">The regular expression `Regex_italy_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 01 GEN/JAN 1988) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6528">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6528">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6529">Det reguljära  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6529">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6530">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6530">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="39811019-4750-445f-b26d-4c0e6c431544" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6554">Momsnummer i Italien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6554">Italy value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6555">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6555">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6556">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6556">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6557">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6557">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6558">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6558">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6559">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6559">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6560">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6560">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6561">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6561">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6562">13 tecken för alfanumeriska mönster med valfria avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6562">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6563">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6563">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6564">13 tecken med alfanumeriska mönster med valfria avgränsare:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6564">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6565">I eller i</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6565">I or i</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6566">T eller t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6566">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6567">Valfritt blanksteg, punkt, bindestreck eller kommatecken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6567">optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6568">11 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6568">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6569">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6569">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6570">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6570">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6571">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6571">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6572">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6572">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6573">Funktionen Func_italy_value_added_tax_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6573">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6574">Ett nyckelord från Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6574">A keyword from Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6575">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6575">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6576">Funktionen Func_italy_value_added_tax_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6576">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Italy Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="26a8cc07-2283-4a2a-ab1d-4ab643c4c67f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6578">Keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6578">Keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

## <a name="japan-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6584">Bankkontonummer för Japan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6584">Japan bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6585">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6585">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6586">sju eller åtta siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6586">seven or eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6587">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6587">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6588">bankkontonummer:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6588">bank account number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6589">sju eller åtta siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6589">seven or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6590">bankkontokontorskod:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6590">bank account branch code:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6591">fyra siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6591">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6592">Blanksteg eller streck (valfritt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6592">a space or dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6593">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6593">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6594">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6594">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6595">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6595">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6596">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6596">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6597">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6597">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6598">Funktionen Func_jp_bank_account hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6598">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6599">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_jp_bank_account hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6599">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6600">Något av följande är sant:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6600">One of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6601">Funktionen för Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6601">The function Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6602">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6602">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6603">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6603">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6604">Funktionen Func_jp_bank_account hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6604">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6605">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_jp_bank_account hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6605">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="d354f95b-96ee-4b80-80bc-4377312b55bc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Version minEngineVersion="15.01.0131.000">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
  </Version>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6606">Nyckelord</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6606">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="japan-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6652">Japans körkortsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6652">Japan driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6653">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6653">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6654">12 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6654">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6655">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6655">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6656">12 siffror i följd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6656">12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6657">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6657">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6658">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6658">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6659">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6659">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6660">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6660">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6661">Funktionen Func_jp_drivers_license_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6661">The function Func_jp_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6662">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6662">A keyword from Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="c6011143-d087-451c-8313-7f6d4aed2270" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-my-number---corporate"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6700">Japan, mitt nummer – företag</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6700">Japan My Number - Corporate</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6701">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6701">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6702">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6702">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6703">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6703">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6704">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6704">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6705">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6705">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6706">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6706">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6707">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6707">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6708">13-siffrigt nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6708">13-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6709">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6709">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6710">13-siffrigt nummer:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6710">13-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6711">en siffra från en till nio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6711">one digit from one to nine</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6712">12 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6712">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6713">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6713">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6714">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6714">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6715">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6715">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6716">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6716">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6717">Funktionen Func_japanese_my_number_corporate hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6717">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6718">Ett nyckelord från Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6718">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6719">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6719">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6720">Funktionen Func_japanese_my_number_corporate hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6720">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Corporate -->
      <Entity id="9e0eaf79-ff20-4ffb-b3e4-e7368d5db6ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6721">Nyckelord</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6721">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_japan_my_number_corporate"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6722">Keyword_japan_my_number_corporate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6722">Keyword_japan_my_number_corporate</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6723">företagsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6723">corporate number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6724">マイナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6724">マイナンバー</span></span>

## <a name="japan-my-number---personal"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6733">Japan, mitt nummer – privat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6733">Japan My Number - Personal</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6734">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6734">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6735">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6735">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6736">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6736">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6737">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6737">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6738">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6738">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6739">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6739">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6740">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6740">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6741">12-siffrigt nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6741">12-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6742">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6742">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6743">12-siffrigt nummer:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6743">12-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6744">fyra siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6744">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6745">Ett valfritt blanksteg, punkt eller bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6745">an optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6746">fyra siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6746">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6747">Ett valfritt blanksteg, punkt eller bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6747">an optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6748">fyra siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6748">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6749">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6749">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6750">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6750">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6751">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6751">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6752">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6752">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6753">Funktionen för Func_japanese_my_number_personal hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6753">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6754">Ett nyckelord från Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6754">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6755">En DLP-princip har låg konfidens för att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6755">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6756">Funktionen för Func_japanese_my_number_personal hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6756">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Personal -->
      <Entity id="98da8e66-7299-4ebd-9f82-c871ab37d3ef" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6765">個人番号カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6765">個人番号カード</span></span>
