## <a name="japan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6769">Japan passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6769">Japan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6770">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6770">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6771">Två bokstäver följt av sju siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6771">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6772">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6772">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6773">Två bokstäver (inte teckenkänsliga) följt av sju siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6773">two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6774">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6774">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6775">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6775">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6776">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6776">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6777">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6777">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6778">Funktionen för Func_jp_passport hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6778">The function Func_jp_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6779">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_jp_passport hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6779">A keyword from Keyword_jp_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="75177310-1a09-4613-bf6d-833aae3743f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-residence-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6796">Japan residence card number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6796">Japan residence card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6797">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6797">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6798">12 bokstäver och siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6798">12 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6799">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6799">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6800">12 bokstäver och siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6800">12 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6801">Två bokstäver (inte versaler och teckenkänsliga)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6801">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6802">åtta siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6802">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6803">Två bokstäver (inte versaler och teckenkänsliga)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6803">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6804">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6804">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6805">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6805">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6806">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6806">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6807">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6807">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6808">Det reguljära uttrycket Regex_jp_residence_card_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6808">The regular expression Regex_jp_residence_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6809">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_jp_residence_card_number hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6809">A keyword from Keyword_jp_residence_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Japan Residence Card Number-->
-<Entity id="ac36fef2-a289-4e2c-bb48-b02366e89fc0" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_jp_residence_card_number"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_residence_card_number"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

```xml
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-social-insurance-number-sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6841">Japan social insurance number (SIN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6841">Japan social insurance number (SIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6842">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6842">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6843">7-12 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6843">7-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6844">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6844">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6845">7-12 siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6845">7-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6846">fyra siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6846">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6847">Ett bindestreck (valfritt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6847">a hyphen (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6848">sex siffror ELLER</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6848">six digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6849">7–12 siffror i följd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6849">7-12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6850">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6850">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6851">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6851">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6852">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6852">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6853">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6853">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6854">Funktionen för Func_jp_sin hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6854">The function Func_jp_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6855">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_jp_sin hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6855">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6856">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6856">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6857">Funktionen för Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6857">The function Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6858">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_jp_sin hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6858">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="c840e719-0896-45bb-84fd-1ed5c95e45ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin_pre_1997" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6879">Lettiska körkortsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6879">Latvia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6880">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6880">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6881">Tre bokstäver följt av sex siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6881">three letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6882">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6882">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6883">tre bokstäver och sex siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6883">three letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6884">Tre bokstäver (inte versaler och teckenkänsliga)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6884">three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6885">sex siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6885">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6886">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6886">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6887">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6887">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6888">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6888">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6889">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6889">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6890">Det reguljära  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6890">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-6891">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` eller `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-6891">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="ec996de0-30f2-46b1-b192-4d2ff8805fa7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7016">Personlig kod för Lettland</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7016">Latvia personal code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7017">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7017">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7018">11 siffror och ett valfritt bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7018">11 digits and an optional hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7019">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7019">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7020">Gammalt format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7020">Old format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7021">11 siffror och ett bindestreck:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7021">11 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7022">Sex siffror som motsvarar födelsedatumet (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7022">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7023">ett bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7023">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7024">en siffra som motsvarar födelsedatumet ("0" för 19:e talet, "1" för 20:e talet och "2" för 2000-talet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7024">one digit that corresponds to the century of birth ("0" for 19th century, "1" for 20th century, and "2" for 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7025">fyra siffror, slumpmässigt genererade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7025">four digits, randomly generated</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7026">Nytt format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7026">New format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7027">11 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7027">11 digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7028">Två siffror "32"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7028">Two digits "32"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7029">Nio siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7029">Nine digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7030">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7030">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7031">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7031">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7032">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7032">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7033">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7033">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7034">Funktionen eller  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` regex hittar `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7034">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7035">Ett nyckelord  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7035">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7036">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7036">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7037">Funktionen eller  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` regex hittar `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7037">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="03fcf763-27c2-49ed-9422-2641c6c895c9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="latvia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7100">Lettiska passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7100">Latvia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7101">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7101">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7102">två bokstäver eller siffror följt av sju siffror utan blanksteg eller avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7102">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7103">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7103">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7104">Två bokstäver eller siffror följt av sju siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7104">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7105">två siffror eller bokstäver (inte teckenkänsliga)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7105">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7106">sju siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7106">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7107">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7107">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7108">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7108">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7109">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7109">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7110">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7110">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7111">Det reguljära  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7111">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7112">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7112">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7113">Det reguljära `Regex_eu_passport_date1` uttrycket hittar datum i formatet DD.MM.YYYY eller ett nyckelord från `Keywords_eu_passport_date` hittas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7113">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7114">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7114">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7115">Det reguljära  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7115">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7116">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7116">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="23ae25ec-cc28-421b-b77a-3054eadf1ede" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7139">Litauens körkortsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7139">Lithuania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7140">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7140">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7141">Åtta siffror utan blanksteg och avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7141">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7142">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7142">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7143">åtta siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7143">eight digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7144">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7144">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7145">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7145">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7146">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7146">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7147">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7147">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7148">Det reguljära  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7148">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7149">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` eller `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7149">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="86f7628b-e0f4-4dc3-9fbc-e4300e4c7d78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7274">Personlig kod för Litauen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7274">Lithuania personal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7275">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7275">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7276">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7276">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7277">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7277">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7278">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7278">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7279">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7279">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7280">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7280">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7281">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7281">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7282">11 siffror utan blanksteg och avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7282">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7283">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7283">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7284">11 siffror utan blanksteg och avgränsare:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7284">11 digits without spaces and delimiters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7285">en siffra (1–6) som motsvarar personens kön och födelsedatumet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7285">one digit (1-6) that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7286">Sex siffror som motsvarar födelsedatum (AMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7286">six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7287">Tre siffror som motsvarar serienumret för födelsedatumet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7287">three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7288">en checksiffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7288">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7289">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7289">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7290">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7290">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7291">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7291">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7292">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7292">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7293">Funktionen hittar  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7293">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7294">Ett nyckelord  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7294">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7295">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7295">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7296">Funktionen hittar  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7296">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="cd6d3786-8ec3-4524-a2cf-1e0095379171" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7331">Litauen passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7331">Lithuania passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7332">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7332">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7333">åtta siffror eller bokstäver utan blanksteg eller avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7333">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7334">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7334">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7335">åtta siffror eller bokstäver (inte teckenkänsliga)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7335">eight digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7336">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7336">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7337">ej tillämpligt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7337">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7338">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7338">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7339">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7339">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7340">Det reguljära  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7340">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7341">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7341">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7342">Det reguljära `Regex_eu_passport_date3` uttrycket hittar datum i formatet DD MM YYYY eller ett nyckelord från `Keywords_eu_passport_date` hittas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7342">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7343">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7343">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7344">Det reguljära  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7344">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7345">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7345">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="1b79900f-047b-4c3f-846f-7d73b5534bce" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7365">Luxemburgs körkortsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7365">Luxemburg driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7366">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7366">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7367">Sex siffror utan blanksteg och avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7367">six digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7368">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7368">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7369">sex siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7369">six digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7370">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7370">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7371">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7371">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7372">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7372">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7373">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7373">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7374">Det reguljära  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7374">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7375">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` eller `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7375">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="89daf717-1544-4860-9a2e-fc9166dd8852" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7499">Luxemburgs national identification number (natural persons)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7499">Luxemburg national identification number (natural persons)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7500">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7500">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7501">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7501">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7502">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7502">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7503">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7503">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7504">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7504">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7505">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7505">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7506">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7506">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7507">13 siffror utan blanksteg eller avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7507">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7508">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7508">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7509">13 siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7509">13 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7510">11 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7510">11 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7511">två kontrollsiffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7511">two check digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7512">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7512">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7513">ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7513">yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7514">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7514">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7515">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7515">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7516">Funktionen hittar  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7516">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7517">Ett nyckelord  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7517">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7518">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7518">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7519">Funktionen hittar  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7519">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 


```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="aaf661ed-29ec-426d-8bf9-880cad298ebb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7542">Luxemburg-passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7542">Luxemburg passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7543">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7543">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7544">åtta siffror eller bokstäver utan blanksteg eller avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7544">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7545">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7545">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7546">åtta siffror eller bokstäver (inte teckenkänsliga)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7546">eight digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7547">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7547">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7548">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7548">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7549">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7549">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7550">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7550">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7551">Det reguljära  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7551">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7552">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7552">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7553">Det reguljära `Regex_eu_passport_date3` uttrycket hittar datum i formatet DD MM YYYY eller ett nyckelord från `Keywords_eu_passport_date` hittas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7553">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7554">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7554">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7555">Det reguljära  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7555">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7556">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7556">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="81d5c027-bed9-4421-91a0-3b2e55b3eb85" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-non-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7588">Luxemburgs national identification number (icke-naturliga personer)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7588">Luxemburg national identification number (non-natural persons)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7589">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7589">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7590">11 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7590">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7591">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7591">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7592">11 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7592">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7593">två siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7593">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7594">ett valfritt blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7594">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7595">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7595">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7596">ett valfritt blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7596">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7597">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7597">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7598">ett valfritt blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7598">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7599">två siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7599">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7600">en checksiffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7600">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7601">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7601">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7602">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7602">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7603">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7603">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7604">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7604">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7605">Funktionen hittar  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7605">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7606">Ett nyckelord  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7606">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7607">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7607">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7608">Funktionen hittar  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7608">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Non-natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="84bffa3a-d805-4788-a613-b1e4df3804cf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malaysia-identification-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7648">Malaysia identification card number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7648">Malaysia identification card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7649">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7649">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7650">12 siffror med valfria bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7650">12 digits containing optional hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7651">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7651">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7652">12 siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7652">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7653">Sex siffror i formatet YYMMDD, som är födelsedatumet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7653">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7654">Ett streck (valfritt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7654">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7655">plats-av-födelsedatum med två bokstäver</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7655">two-letter place-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7656">Ett streck (valfritt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7656">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7657">tre slumpmässiga siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7657">three random digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7658">ensiffrig kön-kod</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7658">one-digit gender code</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7659">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7659">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7660">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7660">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7661">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7661">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7662">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7662">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7663">Det reguljära uttrycket Regex_malaysia_id_card_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7663">The regular expression Regex_malaysia_id_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7664">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7664">A keyword from Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Malaysia ID Card Number -->
</Entity>
      <Entity id="7f0e921c-9677-435b-aba2-bb8f1013c749" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malaysia_id_card_number" />
```

## <a name="malta-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7691">Maltas körkortsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7691">Malta driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7692">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7692">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7693">Kombination av två tecken och sex siffror i det angivna mönstret</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7693">Combination of two characters and six digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7694">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7694">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7695">kombination av två tecken och sex siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7695">combination of two characters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7696">Två tecken (siffror eller bokstäver, inte teckenkänsliga)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7696">two characters (digits or letters, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7697">ett blanksteg (valfritt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7697">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7698">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7698">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7699">ett blanksteg (valfritt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7699">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7700">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7700">three digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7701">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7701">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7702">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7702">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7703">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7703">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7704">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7704">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7705">Det reguljära  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7705">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7706">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` eller `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7706">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="a3bdaa4a-8371-4735-8fa5-56ee0fb4afc4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7830">Malta-identitetskortsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7830">Malta identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7831">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7831">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7832">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7832">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7833">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7833">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7834">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7834">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7835">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7835">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7836">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7836">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7837">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7837">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7838">sju siffror följt av en bokstav</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7838">seven digits followed by one letter</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7839">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7839">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7840">sju siffror följt av en bokstav:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7840">seven digits followed by one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7841">sju siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7841">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7842">en bokstav i "M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z" (ärendekänsligt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7842">one letter in "M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z" (case insensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7843">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7843">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7844">Ej tillämpligt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7844">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7845">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7845">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7846">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7846">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7847">Det reguljära  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7847">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7848">Ett nyckelord  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7848">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7849">En DLP-princip har låg konfidens för att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7849">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7850">Det reguljära  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7850">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Identity Card Number -->
      <Entity id="854b36b3-a388-4ac8-a4ec-677c2b5e4356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7867">Malta passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7867">Malta passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7868">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7868">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7869">sju siffror utan blanksteg eller avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7869">seven digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7870">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7870">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7871">sju siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7871">seven digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7872">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7872">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7873">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7873">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7874">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7874">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7875">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7875">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7876">Det reguljära  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7876">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7877">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7877">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7878">Ett nyckelord `Keywords_eu_passport_date` från hittas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7878">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7879">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7879">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7880">Det reguljära  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7880">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7881">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7881">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="b2b21198-48f9-4d13-b2a5-03969bff0fb8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7901">Maltas skatteidentifieringsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7901">Malta tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7902">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7902">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7903">För Maltesiska:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7903">For Maltese nationals:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7904">sju siffror och en bokstav i det angivna mönstret</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7904">seven digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7905">Non-Denesiska ochesiska enheter:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7905">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7906">nio siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7906">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7907">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7907">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7908">Esiska: sju siffror och en bokstav</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7908">Maltese nationals: seven digits and one letter</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7909">sju siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7909">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7910">en bokstav (inte en ärendekänslig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7910">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7911">Non-Denesiska och enheter av senesiska: nio siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7911">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: nine digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7912">nio siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7912">nine digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7913">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7913">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7914">Ej tillämpligt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7914">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7915">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7915">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7916">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7916">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7917">Regex eller  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  hittar innehåll som matchar `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7917">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7918">Ett nyckelord  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7918">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7919">En DLP-princip har låg konfidens för att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7919">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7920">Regex eller  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` hittar innehåll som matchar `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7920">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Tax ID Number -->
      <Entity id="ec830c63-65f4-45d0-9d8c-910dc8334b20" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
