## <a name="medicare-beneficiary-identifier-mbi-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7953">MBI-kort (Identifier Identifier)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7953">Medicare Beneficiary Identifier (MBI) card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7954">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7954">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7955">eleven character alphanumeric pattern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7955">eleven character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7956">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7956">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7957">en siffra mellan 1 och 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7957">one digit between 1 to 9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7958">en bokstav utom S, L, O, I, B, Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7958">one letter excluding  S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7959">en siffra eller bokstav utom S, L, O, I, B, Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7959">one digit or letter excluding S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7960">en siffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7960">one digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7961">ett valfritt bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7961">an optional Hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7962">en bokstav utom S, L, O, I, B, Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7962">one letter excluding  S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7963">en siffra eller bokstav utom S, L, O, I, B, Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7963">one digit or letter excluding S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7964">en siffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7964">one digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7965">ett valfritt bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7965">an optional Hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7966">två bokstäver utom S, L, O, I, B, Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7966">two letters excluding  S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7967">två siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7967">two digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7968">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7968">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7969">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7969">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7970">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7970">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7971">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7971">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7972">Det reguljära  `Regex_mbi_card` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7972">The regular expression  `Regex_mbi_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7973">Ett nyckelord  `Keyword_mbi_card` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7973">A keyword from  `Keyword_mbi_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7974">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7974">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7975">Det reguljära  `Regex_mbi_card` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7975">The regular expression  `Regex_mbi_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
    <!-- Medicare Beneficiary Identifier (MBI) card -->
      <Entity id="f753a286-f5cc-47e6-a592-4be25fd02591" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_mbi_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_mbi_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_mbi_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7976">Nyckelord</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7976">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_mbi_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7977">Keyword_mbi_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7977">Keyword_mbi_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7978">mbi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7978">mbi</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7979">mbi #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7979">mbi#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7980">medicare-mottagare #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7980">medicare beneficiary #</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7982">medicare mottagarnr</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7982">medicare beneficiary no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7983">medicare mottagarnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7983">medicare beneficiary number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7984">medicare-mottagare #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7984">medicare beneficiary#</span></span>


## <a name="mexico-unique-population-registry-code-curp"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7985">Mexico Unique Population Registry Code (CURP)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7985">Mexico Unique Population Registry Code (CURP)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7986">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7986">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7987">18 tecken för alfanumeriskt mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7987">18 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7988">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7988">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7989">fyra bokstäver (inkänsliga versaler)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7989">four letters (case insensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7990">Sex siffror som anger ett giltigt datum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7990">six digits indicating a valid date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7991">en bokstav – H/h eller M/m</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7991">a letter - H/h or M/m</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7992">Två bokstäver som anger en giltig statuskod i Mexico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7992">two letters indicating a valid Mexican state code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7993">tre bokstäver</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7993">three letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7994">en bokstav eller en siffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7994">one letter or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7995">en siffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7995">one digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7996">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7996">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7997">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7997">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7998">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7998">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-7999">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-7999">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8000">Funktionen hittar  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8000">The function  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8001">Ett nyckelord  `Keyword_mexico_population_registry_code` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8001">A keyword from  `Keyword_mexico_population_registry_code` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8002">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8002">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8003">Funktionen hittar  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8003">The function  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
    <!-- Mexico Unique Population Registry Code (CURP) -->
      <Entity id="e905ad4d-5a74-406d-bf36-b1efca798af4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_mexico_population_registry_code" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_mexico_population_registry_code" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_mexico_population_registry_code" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8004">Nyckelord</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8004">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_mexico_population_registry_code"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8005">Keyword_mexico_population_registry_code</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8005">Keyword_mexico_population_registry_code</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8006">Kodriska Única de Registro de Población</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8006">Clave Única de Registro de Población</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8007">Puffve Unica de Registro de Poblacion</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8007">Clave Unica de Registro de Poblacion</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8008">Registerkod för unik population</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8008">Unique Population Registry Code</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-citizens-service-bsn-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8024">Nederländska medborgares servicenummer (BSN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8024">Netherlands citizen's service (BSN) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8025">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8025">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8026">Åtta eller nio siffror som innehåller valfria blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8026">eight or nine digits containing optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8027">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8027">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8028">åtta-nio siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8028">eight-nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8029">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8029">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8030">ett blanksteg (valfritt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8030">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8031">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8031">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8032">ett blanksteg (valfritt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8032">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8033">två-tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8033">two-three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8034">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8034">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8035">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8035">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8036">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8036">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8037">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8037">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8038">Funktionen för Func_netherlands_bsn hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8038">The function Func_netherlands_bsn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8039">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_netherlands_bsn hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8039">A keyword from Keyword_netherlands_bsn is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8040">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8040">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Citizen's Service (BSN) Number -->
      <Entity id="c5f54253-ef7e-44f6-a578-440ed67e946d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_bsn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8064">Nederländska körkortsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8064">Netherlands driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8065">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8065">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8066">tio siffror utan blanksteg och avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8066">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8067">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8067">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8068">tio siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8068">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8069">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8069">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8070">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8070">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8071">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8071">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8072">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8072">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8073">Det reguljära  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8073">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8074">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` eller `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8074">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="6247fbea-ab80-4be5-8233-308b7c031401" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8202">Nederländska passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8202">Netherlands passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8203">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8203">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8204">Nio bokstäver eller siffror utan blanksteg eller avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8204">nine letters or digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8205">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8205">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8206">nio bokstäver eller siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8206">nine letters or digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8207">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8207">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8208">ej tillämpligt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8208">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8209">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8209">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8210">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8210">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8211">Det reguljära  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8211">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8212">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8212">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8213">Det reguljära uttrycket hittar datum i formatet `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Exempel - 26 MAA/MAR 2012)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8213">The regular expression `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format  DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 26 MAA/MAR 2012)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8214">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8214">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8215">Det reguljära  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8215">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8216">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8216">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="61786727-bafd-45f6-94d9-888d815e228e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8234">Nederländska skatteidentifieringsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8234">Netherlands tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8235">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8235">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8236">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8236">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8237">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8237">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8238">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8238">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8239">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8239">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8240">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8240">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8241">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8241">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8242">Nio siffror utan blanksteg eller avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8242">nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8243">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8243">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8244">nio siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8244">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8245">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8245">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8246">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8246">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8247">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8247">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8248">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8248">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8249">Funktionen hittar  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8249">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8250">Ett nyckelord  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8250">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8251">En DLP-princip har låg konfidens för att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8251">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8252">Funktionen hittar  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8252">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="01f42a64-eba7-4892-a67b-398237e4ade2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
```

## <a name="netherlands-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8290">Nederländska momsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8290">Netherlands value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8291">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8291">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8292">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8292">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8293">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8293">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8294">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8294">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8295">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8295">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8296">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8296">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8297">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8297">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8298">14 tecken för alfanumeriskt mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8298">14 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8299">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8299">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8300">Alfanumeriskt mönster med 14 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8300">14-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8301">N eller n</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8301">N or n</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8302">L eller l</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8302">L or l</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8303">Valfritt blanksteg, punkt eller bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8303">optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8304">nio siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8304">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8305">Valfritt blanksteg, punkt eller bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8305">optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8306">B eller b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8306">B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8307">två siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8307">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8308">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8308">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8309">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8309">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8310">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8310">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8311">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8311">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8312">Funktionen Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8312">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8313">Ett nyckelord från Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8313">A keyword from Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8314">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8314">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8315">Funktionen Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8315">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="4f320d9b-4972-41ae-b337-88d499bb1ade" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8324">Bankkontonummer för Nya Zeeland</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8324">New Zealand bank account number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8325">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8325">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8326">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8326">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8327">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8327">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8328">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8328">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8329">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8329">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8330">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8330">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8331">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8331">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8332">14-siffrigt till 16-siffrigt mönster med valfri avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8332">14-digit to 16-digit pattern with optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8333">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8333">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8334">14-siffrigt till 16-siffrigt mönster med valfri avgränsare:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8334">14-digit to 16-digit pattern with optional delimiter:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8335">två siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8335">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8336">Ett valfritt bindestreck eller blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8336">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8337">tre till fyra siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8337">three to four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8338">Ett valfritt bindestreck eller blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8338">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8339">sju siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8339">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8340">Ett valfritt bindestreck eller blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8340">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8341">Två till tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8341">two to three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8342">Ett bindestreck eller blanksteg för alternativ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8342">an options hyphen or space</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8343">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8343">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8344">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8344">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8345">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8345">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8346">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8346">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8347">Funktionen Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8347">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8348">Ett nyckelord från Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8348">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8349">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8349">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8350">Funktionen Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8350">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Bank Account Number -->
      <Entity id="1a97fc2b-dd2f-48f1-bc4e-2ddf25813956" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zFealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8366">åtta tecken för alfanumeriskt mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8366">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8367">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8367">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8368">åtta tecken för alfanumeriskt mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8368">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8369">två bokstäver</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8369">two letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8370">sex siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8370">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8371">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8371">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8372">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8372">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8373">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8373">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8374">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8374">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8375">Funktionen Func_newzealand_driver_license_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8375">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8376">Ett nyckelord från Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8376">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8377">En DLP-princip har låg konfidens för att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8377">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8378">Funktionen Func_newzealand_driver_license_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8378">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Driver License Number -->
      <Entity id="1924b377-d287-49c9-a737-cfe7a8a2615a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-inland-revenue-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8445">Inåtland i Nya Zeeland</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8445">New Zealand inland revenue number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8446">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8446">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8447">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8447">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8448">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8448">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8449">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8449">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8450">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8450">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8451">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8451">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8452">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8452">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8453">Åtta eller nio siffror med valfria avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8453">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8454">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8454">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8455">Åtta eller nio siffror med valfria avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8455">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8456">två eller tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8456">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8457">Ett valfritt blanksteg eller bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8457">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8458">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8458">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8459">Ett valfritt blanksteg eller bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8459">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8460">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8460">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8461">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8461">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8462">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8462">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8463">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8463">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8464">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8464">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8465">Funktionen för Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8465">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8466">Ett nyckelord från Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8466">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8467">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8467">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8468">Funktionen för Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8468">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Inland Revenue Number -->
      <Entity id="dd0fe2bc-7bcf-455f-bac1-83b1e3eb25fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-ministry-of-health-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8477">Nya Zeeland med hälsonummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8477">New Zealand ministry of health number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8478">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8478">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8479">tre bokstäver, ett blanksteg (valfritt) och fyra siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8479">three letters, a space (optional), and four digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8480">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8480">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8481">Tre bokstäver (inte ärendekänsliga) förutom "I" och "O"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8481">three letters (not case-sensitive) except 'I' and 'O'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8482">ett blanksteg (valfritt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8482">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8483">fyra siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8483">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8484">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8484">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8485">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8485">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8486">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8486">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8487">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8487">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8488">Funktionen Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8488">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8489">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_nz_terms hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8489">A keyword from Keyword_nz_terms is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8490">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8490">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8491">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8491">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8492">Funktionen Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8492">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8493">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8493">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- New Zealand Health Number -->
    <Entity id="2b71c1c8-d14e-4430-82dc-fd1ed6bf05c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_nz_terms" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
       </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-social-welfare-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8507">Nya Zeelands sociala nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8507">New Zealand social welfare number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8508">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8508">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8509">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8509">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8510">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8510">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8511">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8511">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8512">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8512">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8513">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8513">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8514">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8514">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8515">nio siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8515">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8516">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8516">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8517">nio siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8517">nine digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8518">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8518">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8519">Ett valfritt bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8519">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8520">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8520">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8521">Ett valfritt bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8521">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8522">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8522">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8523">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8523">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8524">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8524">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8525">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8525">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8526">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8526">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8527">Funktionen för Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8527">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8528">Ett nyckelord från Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8528">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8529">En DLP-princip har låg konfidens för att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8529">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8530">Funktionen för Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8530">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Newzealand Social Welfare Number -->
      <Entity id="20f3c48d-4ac1-4cd2-86bd-34ecc1826e9d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="norway-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8538">Id-nummer för Norge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8538">Norway identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8539">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8539">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8540">11 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8540">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8541">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8541">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8542">11 siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8542">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8543">Sex siffror i formatet DDMMYY som är födelsedatumet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8543">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8544">tresiffrigt enskilt nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8544">three-digit individual number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8545">två kontrollsiffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8545">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8546">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8546">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8547">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8547">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8548">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8548">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8549">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8549">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8550">Funktionen för Func_norway_id_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8550">The function Func_norway_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8551">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_norway_id_number hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8551">A keyword from Keyword_norway_id_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8552">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8552">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8553">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8553">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8554">Funktionen Func_norway_id_numbe hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8554">The function Func_norway_id_numbe finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8555">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8555">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Norway Identification Number -->
<Entity id="d4c8a798-e9f2-4bd3-9652-500d24080fc3" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="philippines-unified-multi-purpose-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8564">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8564">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8565">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8565">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8566">12 siffror avgränsade med bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8566">12 digits separated by hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8567">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8567">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8568">12 siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8568">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8569">fyra siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8569">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8570">ett bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8570">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8571">sju siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8571">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8572">ett bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8572">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8573">en siffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8573">one digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8574">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8574">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8575">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8575">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8576">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8576">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8577">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8577">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8578">Det reguljära uttrycket Regex_philippines_unified_id hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8578">The regular expression Regex_philippines_unified_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8579">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_philippines_id hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8579">A keyword from Keyword_philippines_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Philippines Unified Multi-Purpose ID number -->
<Entity id="019b39dd-8c25-4765-91a3-d9c6baf3c3b3" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_philippines_unified_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_philippines_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8580">Nyckelord</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8580">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_philippines_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8581">Keyword_philippines_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8581">Keyword_philippines_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8582">Enhetligt flerfunktions-ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8582">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8583">UMID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8583">UMID</span></span>

## <a name="poland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8586">Polens körkortsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8586">Poland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8587">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8587">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8588">14 siffror med två snedstreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8588">14 digits containing two forward slashes</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8589">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8589">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8590">14 siffror och två snedstreck:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8590">14 digits and two forward slashes:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8591">fem siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8591">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8592">ett snedstreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8592">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8593">två siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8593">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8594">ett snedstreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8594">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8595">sju siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8595">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8596">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8596">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8597">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8597">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8598">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8598">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8599">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8599">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8600">Det reguljära  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8600">The regular expression  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8601">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` eller `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8601">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Poland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="24d51f99-ee9e-4060-a077-cae58cab1ee4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8726">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8726">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8727">tre bokstäver och sex siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8727">three letters and six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8728">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8728">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8729">Tre bokstäver (inte teckenkänsliga) följt av sex siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8729">three letters (not case-sensitive) followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8730">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8730">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8731">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8731">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8732">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8732">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8733">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8733">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8734">Funktionen för Func_polish_national_id hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8734">The function Func_polish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8735">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8735">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8736">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8736">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Identity Card-->
<Entity id="25E64989-ED5D-40CA-A939-6C14183BB7BF" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8740">Numer dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8740">Numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8741">Wa i numer dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8741">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>

## <a name="poland-national-id-pesel"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8747">Polens national-ID (PESEL)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8747">Poland national ID (PESEL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8748">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8748">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8749">11 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8749">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8750">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8750">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8751">Sex siffror som representerar födelsedatum i formatet YYMMDD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8751">six digits representing date of birth in the format YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8752">fyra siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8752">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8753">en checksiffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8753">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8754">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8754">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8755">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8755">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8756">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8756">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8757">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8757">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8758">Funktionen för Func_pesel_identification_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8758">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8759">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_pesel_identification_number hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8759">A keyword from Keyword_pesel_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8760">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8760">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8761">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8761">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8762">Funktionen för Func_pesel_identification_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8762">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8763">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8763">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland National ID (PESEL) -->
      <Entity id="E3AAF206-4297-412F-9E06-BA8487E22456" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8766">dowód osobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8766">dowód osobisty</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8768">niepowtarzalny numer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8768">niepowtarzalny numer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8769">niepowtarzalnynumer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8769">niepowtarzalnynumer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8770">nr.-pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8770">nr.-pesel</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8773">pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8773">pesel</span></span>

## <a name="poland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8775">Polen passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8775">Poland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8776">Den här typen av känslig information ingår i typen Känslig information i EU Passport Number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8776">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8777">Det är tillgängligt som en fristående typ av känslig information.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8777">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8778">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8778">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8779">Två bokstäver och sju siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8779">two letters and seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8780">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8780">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8781">Två bokstäver (inte teckenkänsliga) följt av sju siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8781">Two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8782">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8782">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8783">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8783">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8784">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8784">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8785">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8785">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8786">Funktionen hittar `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8786">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8787">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8787">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8788">Ett nyckelord från `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8788">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8789">Ett nyckelord `Keywords_eu_passport_date` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8789">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8790">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8790">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8791">Funktionen hittar `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8791">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8792">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8792">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8793">Ett nyckelord från `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8793">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8794">En DLP-princip har låg konfidens för att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8794">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8795">Funktionen hittar `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8795">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8796">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8796">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="03937FB5-D2B6-4487-B61F-0F8BFF7C3517" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
