## <a name="poland-regon-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8822">PolenS REGON-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8822">Poland REGON number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8823">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8823">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8824">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8824">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8825">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8825">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8826">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8826">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8827">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8827">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8828">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8828">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8829">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8829">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8830">9- eller 14-siffrigt nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8830">9-digit or 14-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8831">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8831">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8832">Nio eller fyrsiffriga siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8832">nine digit or 14-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8833">nio siffror eller</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8833">nine digits or</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8834">nio siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8834">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8835">bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8835">hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8836">fem siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8836">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8837">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8837">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8838">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8838">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8839">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8839">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8840">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8840">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8841">Funktionen för Func_polish_regon_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8841">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8842">Ett nyckelord från Keywords_polish_regon_number hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8842">A keyword from Keywords_polish_regon_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8843">En DLP-princip har låg konfidens för att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8843">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8844">Funktionen för Func_polish_regon_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8844">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Polish REGON Number  -->
      <Entity id="fc87b421-f437-4f8b-b739-29a735ead0d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8861">Polens skatteidentifieringsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8861">Poland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8862">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8862">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8863">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8863">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8864">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8864">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8865">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8865">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8866">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8866">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8867">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8867">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8868">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8868">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8869">11 siffror utan blanksteg eller avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8869">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8870">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8870">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8871">11 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8871">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8872">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8872">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8873">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8873">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8874">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8874">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8875">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8875">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8876">Funktionen hittar  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8876">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8877">Ett nyckelord  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8877">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
  
```xml
      <!-- Poland Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="1ff28b4d-40f2-49e9-b677-9606a88e2bca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-citizen-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8907">Portugal med kreditkortsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8907">Portugal citizen card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8908">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8908">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8909">åtta siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8909">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8910">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8910">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8911">åtta siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8911">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8912">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8912">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8913">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8913">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8914">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8914">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8915">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8915">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8916">Det reguljära uttrycket Regex_portugal_citizen_card hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8916">The regular expression Regex_portugal_citizen_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8917">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_portugal_citizen_card hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8917">A keyword from Keyword_portugal_citizen_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Portugal Citizen Card Number -->
<Entity id="91a7ece2-add4-4986-9a15-c84544d81ecd" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_citizen_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_portugal_citizen_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8937">Portugals körkortsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8937">Portugal driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8938">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8938">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8939">två mönster – två bokstäver följt av 5–8 siffror med specialtecken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8939">two patterns - two letters followed by 5-8 digits with special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8940">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8940">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8941">Mönster 1: Två bokstäver följt av 5/6 med specialtecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8941">Pattern 1: Two letters followed by 5/6 with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8942">Två bokstäver (inte versaler och teckenkänsliga)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8942">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8943">Ett bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8943">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8944">Fem eller sex siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8944">Five or Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8945">Ett blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8945">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8946">En siffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8946">One digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8947">Mönster 2: En bokstav följt av 6/8 siffror med specialtecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8947">Pattern 2: One letter followed by 6/8 digits with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8948">En bokstav (inte en ärendekänslig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8948">One letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8949">Ett bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8949">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8950">Sex eller åtta siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8950">Six or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8951">Ett blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8951">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8952">En siffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8952">One digit</span></span>

    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8953">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8953">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8954">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8954">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8955">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8955">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8956">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8956">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8957">Det reguljära  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8957">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-8958">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` eller `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-8958">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="977f1e5a-2c33-4bcc-b516-95bb275cff23" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9090">Portugal passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9090">Portugal passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9091">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9091">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9092">en bokstav följt av sex siffror utan blanksteg eller avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9092">one letter followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9093">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9093">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9094">en bokstav följt av sex siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9094">one letter followed by six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9095">en bokstav (inte en ärendekänslig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9095">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9096">sex siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9096">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9097">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9097">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9098">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9098">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9099">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9099">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9100">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9100">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9101">Det reguljära  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9101">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9102">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9102">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9103">Det reguljära `Regex_eu_passport_date1` uttrycket hittar datum i formatet DD.MM.YYYY eller ett nyckelord från `Keywords_eu_passport_date` hittas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9103">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9104">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9104">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9105">Det reguljära  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9105">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9106">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9106">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="080a52fd-a7bc-431e-b54d-51f08f59db11" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9133">Portugals skatteidentifieringsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9133">Portugal tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9134">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9134">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9135">Nio siffror med valfria blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9135">nine digits with optional spaces</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9136">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9136">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9137">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9137">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9138">ett valfritt blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9138">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9139">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9139">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9140">ett valfritt blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9140">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9141">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9141">three digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9142">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9142">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9143">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9143">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9144">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9144">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9145">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9145">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9146">Funktionen hittar  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9146">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9147">Ett nyckelord  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9147">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9148">En DLP-princip har låg konfidens för att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9148">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9149">Funktionen hittar  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9149">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="65372402-3131-4f1e-9983-4439841d1f15" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9174">Rumäniens körkortsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9174">Romania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9175">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9175">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9176">ett tecken följt av åtta siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9176">one character followed by eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9177">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9177">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9178">ett tecken följt av åtta siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9178">one character followed by eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9179">en bokstav (inte en teckenkänslig) eller en siffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9179">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9180">åtta siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9180">eight digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9181">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9181">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9182">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9182">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9183">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9183">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9184">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9184">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9185">Det reguljära  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9185">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9186">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` eller `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9186">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="b5511ace-2fd8-4ae4-b6fc-c7c6e4689e3c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
```

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9323">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9323">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9324">en siffra från 1–9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9324">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9325">Sex siffror som representerar födelsedatum (DSMMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9325">six digits representing date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9326">två siffror, som kan vara 01-52 eller 99</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9326">two digits, which can be 01-52 or 99</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9327">fyra siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9327">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9328">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9328">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9329">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9329">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9330">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9330">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9331">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9331">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9332">Funktionen hittar  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9332">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9333">Ett nyckelord  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9333">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9334">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9334">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9335">Funktionen hittar  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9335">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Personal Numerical Code (CNP) -->
      <Entity id="eb5fa399-fe28-4c67-8188-d63a616ed89c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9386">Rumänien, passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9386">Romania passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9387">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9387">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9388">Åtta eller nio siffror utan blanksteg och avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9388">eight or nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9389">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9389">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9390">Åtta eller nio siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9390">eight or nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9391">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9391">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9392">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9392">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9393">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9393">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9394">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9394">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9395">Det reguljära  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9395">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9396">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9396">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9397">Det reguljära uttrycket hittar datum i `Regex_romania_eu_passport_date` formatet DD MMM/MMM YY (Exempel- 01 FEB/10 FEB) eller ett nyckelord `Keywords_eu_passport_date` från hittas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9397">The regular expression `Regex_romania_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YY (Example- 01 FEB/FEB 10) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9398">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9398">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9399">Det reguljära  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9399">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9400">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9400">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="5d31b90c-7fe2-4a76-a14b-767b8fd19d6c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9419">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9419">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9420">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9420">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9421">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9421">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9422">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9422">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9423">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9423">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9424">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9424">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9425">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9425">Format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9427">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9427">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9428">10-siffrigt nummer:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9428">10-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9429">två siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9429">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9430">Ett valfritt blanksteg eller bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9430">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9431">två siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9431">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9432">ett valfritt blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9432">an optional space</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9435">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9435">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9436">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9436">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9457">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9457">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9458">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9458">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9459">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9459">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9460">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9460">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9461">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9461">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9462">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9462">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9463">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9463">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9464">niosiffrigt nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9464">nine-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9465">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9465">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9466">niosiffriga nummer:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9466">nine-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9467">två siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9467">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9468">Ett valfritt blanksteg eller bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9468">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9469">sju siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9469">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9470">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9470">Checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9472">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9472">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9473">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9473">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9474">Regex-Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9474">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9475">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9475">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml

      <Entity id="ac5f4878-75e4-4b82-af2d-02e13ea9f411" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="saudi-arabia-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9492">Saudiarabiens national-ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9492">Saudi Arabia National ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9493">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9493">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9494">10 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9494">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9495">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9495">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9496">10 siffror i följd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9496">10 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9497">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9497">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9498">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9498">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9499">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9499">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9500">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9500">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9501">Det reguljära uttrycket Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9501">The regular expression Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9502">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9502">A keyword from Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Saudi Arabia National ID -->
<Entity id="8c5a0ba8-404a-41a3-8871-746aa21ee6c0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="singapore-national-registration-identity-card-nric-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9509">Nummer till Singapore national registration identity card (NRIC)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9509">Singapore national registration identity card (NRIC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9510">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9510">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9511">nio bokstäver och siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9511">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9512">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9512">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9513">Nio bokstäver och siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9513">nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9514">bokstaven "F", "G", "S" eller "T" (inte ärendekänsligt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9514">the letter "F", "G", "S", or "T" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9515">sju siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9515">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9516">en alfabetisk kontrollsiffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9516">an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9517">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9517">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9518">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9518">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9519">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9519">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9520">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9520">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9521">Det reguljära uttrycket Regex_singapore_nric hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9521">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9522">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_singapore_nric hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9522">A keyword from Keyword_singapore_nric is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9523">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9523">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9524">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9524">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9525">Det reguljära uttrycket Regex_singapore_nric hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9525">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9526">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9526">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Singapore National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) Number -->
<Entity id="cead390a-dd83-4856-9751-fb6dc98c34da" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9538">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9538">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9539">ett tecken följt av sju siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9539">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9540">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9540">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9541">ett tecken följt av sju siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9541">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9542">en bokstav (inte en teckenkänslig) eller en siffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9542">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9543">sju siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9543">seven digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9544">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9544">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9545">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9545">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9546">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9546">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9547">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9547">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9548">Det reguljära  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9548">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9549">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` eller `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9549">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="14240c22-b6de-4ce5-a90b-137f74252513" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9676">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9676">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9677">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9677">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9678">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9678">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9679">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9679">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9680">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9680">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9681">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9681">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9682">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9682">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9683">nio eller tio siffror som innehåller valfritt omslag</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9683">nine or ten digits containing optional backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9684">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9684">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9685">Sex siffror som representerar födelsedatum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9685">six digits representing date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9686">valfritt snedstreck (/)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9686">optional slash (/)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9687">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9687">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9688">en valfri kontrollsiffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9688">one optional check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9689">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9689">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9690">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9690">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9691">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9691">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9692">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9692">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9693">Funktionen hittar  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9693">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9694">Ett nyckelord  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9694">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9695">En DLP-princip har låg konfidens för att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9695">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9696">Funktionen hittar  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9696">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Personal Number -->
      <Entity id="951c26b7-3b35-4f73-924b-15dd599cb9ab" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="slovakia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9743">Slovakiens passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9743">Slovakia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9744">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9744">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9745">en siffra eller bokstav följt av sju siffror utan blanksteg eller avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9745">one digit or letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9746">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9746">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9747">en siffra eller bokstav (inte en teckenkänslig) följt av sju siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9747">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9748">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9748">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9749">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9749">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9750">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9750">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9751">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9751">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9752">Det reguljära  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9752">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9753">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9753">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9754">Det reguljära `Regex_eu_passport_date1` uttrycket hittar datum i formatet DD.MM.YYYY eller ett nyckelord från `Keywords_eu_passport_date` hittas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9754">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9755">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9755">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9756">Det reguljära  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9756">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9757">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9757">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="238e1f08-d80e-4793-af33-9b57918335b7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9779">Sloveniens körkortsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9779">Slovenia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9780">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9780">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9781">Nio siffror utan blanksteg och avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9781">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9782">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9782">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9783">nio siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9783">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9784">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9784">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9785">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9785">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9786">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9786">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9787">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9787">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9788">Det reguljära  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9788">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9789">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` eller `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9789">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5bc089a-f2ee-433d-a6b1-5c253051d6f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9918">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9918">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9919">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9919">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9920">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9920">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9921">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9921">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9922">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9922">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9923">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9923">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9924">13 siffror utan blanksteg eller avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9924">13 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9925">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9925">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9926">13 siffror i det angivna mönstret:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9926">13 digits in the specified pattern:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9927">sju siffror som motsvarar födelsedatumet (DDMMLLL) där "LLL" motsvarar de tre sista siffrorna i födelsedatumet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9927">seven digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMLLL) where "LLL" corresponds to the last three digits of the birth year</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9928">två siffror som motsvarar födelsedatumet "50"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9928">two digits that correspond to the area of birth "50"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9929">Tre siffror som motsvarar en kombination av kön och serienummer för personer som föds på samma dag (000-499 för man och 500-999 för kvinna)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9929">three digits that correspond to a combination of gender and serial number for persons born on the same day (000-499 for male and 500-999 for female)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9930">en checksiffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9930">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9931">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9931">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9932">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9932">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9933">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9933">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9934">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9934">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9935">Funktionen hittar  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9935">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9936">Ett nyckelord  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9936">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9937">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9937">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9938">Funktionen hittar  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9938">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number -->
      <Entity id="68948b27-803d-41e4-adf1-13e05eb541bb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9966">Slovenska passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9966">Slovenia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9967">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9967">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9968">Två bokstäver följt av sju siffror utan blanksteg eller avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9968">two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9969">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9969">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9970">Två bokstäver följt av sju siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9970">two letters followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9971">bokstaven "P"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9971">the letter "P"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9972">en versal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9972">one uppercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9973">sju siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9973">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9974">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9974">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9975">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9975">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9976">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9976">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9977">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9977">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9978">Det reguljära  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9978">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9979">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9979">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9980">Det reguljära `Regex_eu_passport_date1` uttrycket hittar datum i formatet DD.MM.YYYY eller ett nyckelord från `Keywords_eu_passport_date` hittas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9980">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9981">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9981">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9982">Det reguljära  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9982">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9983">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9983">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="235b7976-7bbe-4df5-bb40-08678e749d1a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9996">Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9996">Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9997">številka potnega lista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9997">številka potnega lista</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-9998">potek veljavckti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-9998">potek veljavnosti</span></span>

## <a name="slovenia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10006">Slovenska skatteidentifieringsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10006">Slovenia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10007">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10007">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10008">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10008">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10009">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10009">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10010">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10010">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10011">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10011">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10012">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10012">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10013">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10013">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10014">Åtta siffror utan blanksteg eller avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10014">eight digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10015">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10015">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10016">en siffra från 1–9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10016">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10017">sex siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10017">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10018">en checksiffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10018">one check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10019">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10019">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10020">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10020">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10021">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10021">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10022">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10022">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10023">Funktionen hittar  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10023">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10024">Ett nyckelord  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10024">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10025">En DLP-princip har låg konfidens för att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10025">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10026">Funktionen hittar  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10026">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="e47b071e-c352-4d70-8241-8c215ad65505" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
