## <a name="south-africa-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10050">South Africa identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10050">South Africa identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10051">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10051">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10052">13 siffror som kan innehålla blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10052">13 digits that may contain spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10053">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10053">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10054">13 siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10054">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10055">Sex siffror i formatet YYMMDD, som är födelsedatumet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10055">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10056">fyra siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10056">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10057">en ensiffrig indikator</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10057">a single-digit citizenship indicator</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10058">siffran "8" eller "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10058">the digit "8" or "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10059">en siffra, som är en kontrollsummasiffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10059">one digit, which is a checksum digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10060">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10060">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10061">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10061">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10062">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10062">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10063">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10063">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10064">Funktionen för Func_south_africa_identification_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10064">The function Func_south_africa_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10065">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_south_africa_identification_number hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10065">A keyword from Keyword_south_africa_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10066">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10066">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Africa Identification Number -->
<Entity id="e2adf7cb-8ea6-4048-a2ed-d89eb65f2780" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_africa_identification_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_africa_identification_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="south-korea-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10072">Registreringsnummer för sydkoreanska invånare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10072">South Korea resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10073">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10073">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10074">13 siffror som innehåller ett bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10074">13 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10075">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10075">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10076">13 siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10076">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10077">Sex siffror i formatet YYMMDD, som är födelsedatumet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10077">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10078">ett bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10078">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10079">en siffra som bestäms av talet och kön</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10079">one digit determined by the century and gender</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10080">fyrsiffrig födelsedatumskod</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10080">four-digit region-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10081">en siffra som används för att särskilja personer som de föregående siffrorna är identiska för</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10081">one digit used to differentiate people for whom the preceding numbers are identical</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10082">en kontrollsiffra.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10082">a check digit.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10083">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10083">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10084">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10084">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10085">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10085">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10086">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10086">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10087">Funktionen för Func_south_korea_resident_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10087">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10088">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_south_korea_resident_number hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10088">A keyword from Keyword_south_korea_resident_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10089">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10089">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10090">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10090">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10091">Funktionen för Func_south_korea_resident_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10091">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10092">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10092">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Korea Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="5b802e18-ba80-44c4-bc83-bf2ad36ae36a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10093">Nyckelord</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10093">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_korea_resident_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10094">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10094">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10098">RRN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10098">RRN</span></span>

## <a name="spain-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10100">Spaniens körkortsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10100">Spain driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10101">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10101">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10102">Åtta siffror följt av ett tecken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10102">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10103">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10103">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10104">Åtta siffror följt av ett tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10104">eight digits followed by one character:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10105">åtta siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10105">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10106">en siffra eller bokstav (inte en teckenkänslig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10106">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10107">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10107">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10108">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10108">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10109">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10109">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10110">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10110">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10111">Funktionen eller  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` hittar innehåll som matchar `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10111">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10112">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` eller `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10112">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10113">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10113">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10114">Funktionen eller  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` hittar innehåll som matchar `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10114">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5a82922-b501-4f40-8868-341321146aa2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10115">Nyckelord</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10115">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10116">Keywords_eu_driver är s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10116">Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10117">driverlic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10117">driverlic</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10118">driverlics</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10118">driverlics</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10119">driverlicense</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10119">driverlicense</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10258">sju siffror följt av ett tecken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10258">seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10259">åtta siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10259">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10260">Ett valfritt blanksteg eller bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10260">An optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10261">en bkryssbokstav (inte fallkänslig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10261">one check letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10262">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10262">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10263">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10263">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10264">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10264">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10265">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10265">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10266">Funktionen eller  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` hittar innehåll som matchar `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10266">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10267">Ett nyckelord  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10267">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10268">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10268">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10269">Funktionen eller  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` hittar innehåll som matchar `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10269">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

    
```xml
      <!-- Spain DNI -->
      <Entity id="8e6251b9-47b4-40e8-a42b-0f80876be192" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10293">Spanien passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10293">Spain passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10294">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10294">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10295">En kombination av åtta eller nio tecken med bokstäver och siffror utan blanksteg eller avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10295">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10296">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10296">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10297">En kombination av åtta eller nio tecken med bokstäver och siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10297">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10298">två siffror eller bokstäver</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10298">two digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10299">en siffra eller bokstav (valfritt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10299">one digit or letter (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10300">sex siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10300">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10301">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10301">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10302">Ej tillämpligt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10302">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10303">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10303">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10304">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10304">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10305">Det reguljära  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10305">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10306">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10306">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10307">Det reguljära `Regex_spain_eu_passport_date` uttrycket hittar datum i formatet DD-MM-YYYY eller ett nyckelord från `Keywords_eu_passport_date` hittas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10307">The regular expression `Regex_spain_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD-MM-YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10308">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10308">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10309">Det reguljära  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10309">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10310">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10310">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d17a57de-9fa5-4e9f-85d3-85c26d89686e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_spain_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10323">Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10323">Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10324">libreta pasaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10324">libreta pasaporte</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10325">número pasaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10325">número pasaporte</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10329">números pasaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10329">números pasaporte</span></span>

## <a name="spain-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10339">Spaniens personnummer (SSN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10339">Spain social security number (SSN)</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10340">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10340">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10341">11–12 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10341">11-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10342">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10342">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10343">11–12 siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10343">11-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10344">två siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10344">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10345">ett snedstreck (valfritt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10345">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10346">sju till åtta siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10346">seven to eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10347">ett snedstreck (valfritt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10347">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10348">två siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10348">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10349">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10349">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10350">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10350">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10351">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10351">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10352">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10352">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10353">Funktionen för Func_spanish_social_security_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10353">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10354">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10354">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- - <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10355">Ett nyckelord  `Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10355">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10356">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10356">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10357">Funktionen för Func_spanish_social_security_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10357">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10358">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10358">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Spain SSN -->
    <Entity id="5df987c0-8eae-4bce-ace7-b316347f3070" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true" >
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_spain_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10360">Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10360">Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10368">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10368">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10374">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10374">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10375">sju eller åtta siffror och en eller två bokstäver i det angivna mönstret</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10375">seven or eight digits and one or two letters in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10376">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10376">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10377">Spanska naturliga personer med ett Spanien National Identity Card:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10377">Spanish Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10381">en versaler "L" (gemener/versaler) (gemener/VERSALER) (gemener och versaler) (gemener/VERSALER)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10381">one uppercase letter "L" (case-sensitive)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10383">en versaler (gemener och versaler)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10383">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10384">Invånare som är under 14 år utan spaniens nationalidentitetskort:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10384">Resident Spaniards under the age of 14 years without a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10385">en versal "K" (gemener/versaler) (gemener och versaler) (gemener och versaler)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10385">one uppercase letter "K" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10386">sju siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10386">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10387">en versaler (gemener och versaler)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10387">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10388">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10388">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10389">en versal som är "X", "Y" eller "Z" (gemener och versaler)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10389">one uppercase letter that is "X", "Y", or "Z" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10390">sju siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10390">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10391">en versaler (gemener och versaler)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10391">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10392">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10392">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10393">en versal som är "M" (gemener/versaler) (gemener och versaler) (gemener och versaler)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10393">one uppercase letter that is "M" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10394">sju siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10394">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10395">en versaler (gemener och versaler)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10395">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10396">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10396">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10397">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10397">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10398">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10398">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10399">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10399">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10400">Funktionen eller  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` hittar innehåll som matchar `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10400">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10401">Ett nyckelord  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10401">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10402">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10402">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10403">Funktionen eller  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` hittar innehåll som matchar `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10403">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="10f0d113-b0e1-47dc-872a-a4f45b9376a3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sql-server-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10434">SQL Server en anslutningssträng</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10434">SQL Server connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10435">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10435">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10436">Strängen "Användar-ID", "Användar-ID", "uid" eller "UserId" följt av de tecken och strängar som beskrivs i mönstret nedan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10436">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10437">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10437">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10438">strängen "Användar-ID", "Användar-ID", "uid" eller "UserId"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10438">the string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10439">valfri kombination av 1–200 gemener eller versaler, siffror, symboler, specialtecken eller blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10439">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10440">strängen "Lösenord" eller "pwd" där "pwd" inte föregås av en gemener</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10440">the string "Password" or "pwd" where "pwd" isn't preceded by a lowercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10441">Ett likhetstecken (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10441">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10442">alla tecken som inte är ett dollartecken ($), procenttecken (%) större än symbol (>), symbol (@), citattecken ("), semikolon (;), vänster klammerparentes([) eller vänster klammerparentes ({)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10442">any character that isn't a dollar sign ($), percent symbol (%), greater than symbol (>), at symbol (@), quotation mark ("), semicolon (;), left brace([), or left bracket ({)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10443">valfri kombination av 7–128 tecken som inte är ett semikolon (;), snedstreck (/) eller citattecken (")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10443">any combination of 7-128 characters that are not a semicolon (;), forward slash (/), or quotation mark (")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10444">Semikolon (;) eller citattecken (")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10444">a semicolon (;) or quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10445">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10445">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10446">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10446">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10447">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10447">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10448">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10448">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10449">Det reguljära uttrycket CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10449">The regular expression CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10450">Ett nyckelord CEP_GlobalFilter hittades inte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10450">A keyword from CEP_GlobalFilter isn't found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10451">Det reguljära uttrycket CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder hittar inte innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10451">The regular expression CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10452">Det reguljära uttrycket CEP_CommonExampleKeywords hittar inte innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10452">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```sql
<!---SQL Server Connection String>
<Entity id="e76b6205-d3cb-46f2-bd63-c90153f2f97d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_GlobalFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10453">Nyckelord</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10453">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_globalfilter"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10454">CEP_GlobalFilter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10454">CEP_GlobalFilter</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10455">some-password</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10455">some-password</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10456">någotlösenord</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10456">somepassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10457">secretPassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10457">secretPassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10458">exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10458">sample</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_passwordplaceholder"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10459">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10459">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10460">(Tekniskt sett identifierar den här typen av känslig information dessa nyckelord med hjälp av ett reguljärt uttryck, inte en nyckelordslista.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10460">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10461">Lösenord eller pwd följt av 0-2 blanksteg, ett likhetstecken (=), 0-2 blanksteg och en asterisk (\*) -ELLER-</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10461">Password or pwd followed by 0-2 spaces, an equal sign (=), 0-2 spaces, and an asterisk (\*) -OR-</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10462">Lösenord eller pwd följt av:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10462">Password or pwd followed by:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10463">Likhetstecken (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10463">Equal sign (=)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10464">Mindre än-symbol (<)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10464">Less than symbol (<)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10465">En kombination av 1–200 tecken som är versaler eller gemener, siffror, asterisk (\*), bindestreck (-), understrykning (_) eller blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10465">Any combination of 1-200 characters that are upper- or lowercase letters, digits, an asterisk (\*), hyphen (-), underline (_), or whitespace character</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10466">Större än-symbol (>)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10466">Greater than symbol (>)</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10480">Sverigedrivrutinens licensnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10480">Sweden driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10481">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10481">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10482">tio siffror som innehåller ett bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10482">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10483">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10483">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10484">tio siffror som innehåller ett bindestreck:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10484">ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10485">sex siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10485">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10486">ett bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10486">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10487">fyra siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10487">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10488">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10488">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10489">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10489">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10490">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10490">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10491">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10491">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10492">Det reguljära  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10492">The regular expression  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10493">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` eller `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10493">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="70088720-90dd-47f5-805e-5525f3567391" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10626">National ID för Sverige</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10626">Sweden national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10627">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10627">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10628">10 eller 12 siffror och en valfri avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10628">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10629">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10629">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10630">10 eller 12 siffror och en valfri avgränsare:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10630">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10631">två siffror (valfritt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10631">two digits (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10632">Sex siffror i datumformat YYMMDD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10632">Six digits in date format YYMMDD</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10633">avgränsare av "-" eller "+" (valfritt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10633">delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10634">fyra siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10634">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10635">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10635">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10636">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10636">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10637">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10637">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10638">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10638">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10639">Funktionen hittar `Func_swedish_national_identifier` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10639">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10640">Ett nyckelord `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` från hittas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10640">A keyword from `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10641">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10641">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10642">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10642">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10643">Funktionen hittar `Func_swedish_national_identifier` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10643">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10644">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10644">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden National ID -->
    <Entity id="f69aaf40-79be-4fac-8f05-fd1910d272c8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10663">Sverige passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10663">Sweden passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10664">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10664">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10665">åtta siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10665">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10666">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10666">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10667">åtta siffror i följd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10667">eight consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10668">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10668">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10669">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10669">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10670">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10670">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10671">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10671">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10672">det reguljära uttrycket Regex_sweden_passport_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10672">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10673">ett nyckelord från `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keyword_sweden_passport` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10673">a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_sweden_passport` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10674">det reguljära uttrycket hittar ett datum i formatet `Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YY (01 JAN/JAN 12) eller ett `Keywords_eu_passport_date` nyckelord från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10674">the regular expression `Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date` finds a date in the format DD MMM/MMM YY (01 JAN/JAN 12) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10675">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10675">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10676">det reguljära uttrycket Regex_sweden_passport_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10676">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10677">ett nyckelord från `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keyword_sweden_passport` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10677">a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_sweden_passport` is found.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="ba4e7456-55a9-4d89-9140-c33673553526" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10713">Skatteidentifieringsnummer i Sverige</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10713">Sweden tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10714">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10714">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10715">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10715">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10716">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10716">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10717">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10717">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10718">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10718">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10719">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10719">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10720">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10720">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10721">10 siffror och en symbol i det angivna mönstret</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10721">10 digits and a symbol in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10722">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10722">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10723">10 siffror och en symbol:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10723">10 digits and a symbol:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10724">Sex siffror som motsvarar födelsedatumet (AMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10724">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10725">ett plustecken eller minustecken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10725">a plus sign or minus sign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10726">Tre siffror som gör ID-numret unikt där:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10726">three digits that make the identification number unique where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10727">för nummer som utfärdats före 1990, den sjunde och åttonde siffran identifiera födelsedatum eller foreign-born people</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10727">for numbers issued before 1990, the seventh and eighth digit identify the county of birth or foreign-born people</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10728">Siffran i den nionde positionen anger kön med antingen udda för man eller till och med för kvinna</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10728">the digit in the ninth position indicates gender by either odd for male or even for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10729">en checksiffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10729">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10730">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10730">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10731">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10731">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10732">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10732">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10733">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10733">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10734">Funktionen hittar  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10734">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10735">Ett nyckelord  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10735">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10736">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10736">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10737">Funktionen hittar  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10737">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="139acba0-a5bc-4fbb-876d-f7a493ae8a40" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="swift-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10763">SWIFT-kod</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10763">SWIFT code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10764">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10764">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10765">fyra bokstäver följt av 5–31 bokstäver eller siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10765">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10766">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10766">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10767">fyra bokstäver följt av 5–31 bokstäver eller siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10767">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10768">bankkod på fyra bokstäver (inte ärendekänsligt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10768">four-letter bank code (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10769">ett valfritt blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10769">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10770">4–28 bokstäver eller siffror (BBAN (Basic Bank Account Number))</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10770">4-28 letters or digits (the Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN))</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10771">ett valfritt blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10771">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10772">en till tre bokstäver eller siffror (resten av BBAN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10772">one to three letters or digits (remainder of the BBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10773">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10773">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10774">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10774">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10775">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10775">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10776">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10776">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10777">Det reguljära uttrycket Regex_swift hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10777">The regular expression Regex_swift finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10778">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_swift hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10778">A keyword from Keyword_swift is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="cb2ab58c-9cb8-4c81-baf8-a4e106791df4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_swift" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_swift" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="switzerland-ssn-ahv-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10815">Schweiz SSN AHV-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10815">Switzerland SSN AHV number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10816">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10816">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10817">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10817">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10818">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10818">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10819">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10819">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10820">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10820">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10821">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10821">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10822">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10822">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10823">13-siffrigt nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10823">13-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10824">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10824">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10825">13-siffrigt nummer:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10825">13-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10826">tre siffror – 756</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10826">three digits - 756</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10827">en valfri punkt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10827">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10828">fyra siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10828">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10829">en valfri punkt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10829">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10830">fyra siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10830">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10831">en valfri punkt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10831">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10832">två siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10832">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10833">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10833">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10834">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10834">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10835">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10835">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10836">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10836">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10837">Funktionen för Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10837">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10838">Ett nyckelord från Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10838">A keyword from Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10839">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10839">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10840">Funktionen för Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10840">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Swiss SSN AHV Number -->
      <Entity id="277cfa4b-6eaa-4a1b-9492-099dec849971" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10861">Taiwans national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10861">Taiwan national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10862">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10862">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10863">en bokstav (på engelska) följt av nio siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10863">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10864">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10864">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10865">en bokstav (på engelska) följt av nio siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10865">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10866">en bokstav (på engelska, inte den där den är det.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10866">one letter (in English, not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10867">siffran "1" eller "2"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10867">the digit "1" or "2"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10868">åtta siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10868">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10869">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10869">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10870">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10870">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10871">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10871">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10872">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10872">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10873">Funktionen för Func_taiwanese_national_id hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10873">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10874">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_taiwanese_national_id hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10874">A keyword from Keyword_taiwanese_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10875">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10875">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10876">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10876">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10877">Funktionen för Func_taiwanese_national_id hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10877">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10878">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10878">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwanese National ID -->
<Entity id="4C7BFC34-8DD1-421D-8FB7-6C6182C2AF03" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwanese_national_id" />
      </Pattern>
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
         <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
       </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10887">身分證號碼</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10887">身分證號碼</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10888">身份證號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10888">身份證號</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10890">國民身分證統一編號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10890">國民身分證統一編號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10891">簽名</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10891">簽名</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10894">簽章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10894">簽章</span></span>   
   
## <a name="taiwan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10895">Taiwan passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10895">Taiwan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10896">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10896">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10897">biometrisk passnummer: nio siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10897">biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10898">icke-biometrisk passnummer: nio siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10898">non-biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10899">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10899">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10900">biometrisk pass nummer:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10900">biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10901">tecknet "3"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10901">the character "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10902">åtta siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10902">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10903">icke-biometrisk passnummer:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10903">non-biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10904">nio siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10904">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10905">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10905">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10906">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10906">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10907">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10907">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10908">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10908">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10909">Det reguljära uttrycket Regex_taiwan_passport hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10909">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10910">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_taiwan_passport hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10910">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="e7251cb4-4c2c-41df-963e-924eb3dae04a" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_passport"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_passport"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
