- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10913">ROC-passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10913">ROC passport number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10914">Passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10914">Passport number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10915">Passport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10915">Passport no</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10916">Passport Num</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10916">Passport Num</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10917">Pass #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10917">Passport #</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10918">护照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10918">护照</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10919">中華民國護照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10919">中華民國護照</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10920">Zhōnghuá Mínguó hùzhào</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10920">Zhōnghuá Mínguó hùzhào</span></span>
   
## <a name="taiwan-resident-certificate-arctarc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10921">Taiwan-intjänat certifikat (ARC/TARC) nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10921">Taiwan-resident certificate (ARC/TARC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10922">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10922">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10923">10 bokstäver och siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10923">10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10924">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10924">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10925">10 bokstäver och siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10925">10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10926">Två bokstäver (inte versaler och teckenkänsliga)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10926">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10927">åtta siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10927">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10928">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10928">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10929">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10929">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10930">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10930">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10931">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10931">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10932">Det reguljära uttrycket Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10932">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10933">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10933">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Resident Certificate (ARC/TARC) -->
<Entity id="48269fec-05ea-46ea-b326-f5623a58c6e9" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="thai-population-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10947">Identifieringskod för thailändska</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10947">Thai population identification code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10948">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10948">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10949">13 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10949">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10950">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10950">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10951">13 siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10951">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10952">första siffran är inte noll eller nio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10952">first digit isn't zero or nine</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10953">12 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10953">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10954">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10954">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10955">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10955">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10956">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10956">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10957">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10957">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10958">Funktionen för Func_Thai_Citizen_Id hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10958">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10959">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10959">A keyword from Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10960">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10960">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10961">Funktionen för Func_Thai_Citizen_Id hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10961">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Thai Citizen ID -->
-<Entity id="44ca9e86-ead7-4c5d-884a-e2eaa401515e" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="turkish-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10970">Turkiska national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10970">Turkish national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10971">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10971">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10972">11 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10972">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10973">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10973">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10974">11 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10974">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10975">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10975">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10976">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10976">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10977">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10977">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10978">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10978">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10979">Funktionen för Func_Turkish_National_Id hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10979">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10980">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_Turkish_National_Id hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10980">A keyword from Keyword_Turkish_National_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10981">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10981">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10982">Funktionen för Func_Turkish_National_Id hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10982">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Turkish National Identity -->
-<Entity id="fb621f20-3876-4cfc-acec-8c8e73ca32c7" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10989">Storbritannien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10989">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10990">driver's license number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10990">driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10991">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10991">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10992">Kombination av 18 bokstäver och siffror i det angivna formatet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10992">Combination of 18 letters and digits in the specified format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10993">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10993">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10994">18 bokstäver och siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10994">18 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10995">Fem bokstäver (inte ärendekänsliga) eller siffran "9" i stället för en bokstav.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10995">Five letters (not case-sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10996">En siffra.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10996">One digit.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10997">Fem siffror i datumformatet MMDDY för födelsedatumet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10997">Five digits in the date format MMDDY for date of birth.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10998">Det sjunde tecknet ökas med 50 om drivrutinen är kvinna. för prov, 51 till 62 i stället för 01 till 12.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10998">The seventh character is incremented by 50 if driver is female; for exampe, 51 to 62 instead of 01 to 12.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-10999">Två bokstäver (inte teckenkänsliga) eller siffran "9" i stället för en bokstav.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-10999">Two letters (not case-sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11000">Fem siffror.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11000">Five digits.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11001">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11001">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11002">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11002">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11003">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11003">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11004">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11004">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11005">Funktionen hittar `Func_uk_drivers_license` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11005">The function `Func_uk_drivers_license` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11006">Ett nyckelord `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11006">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11007">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11007">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11008">En DLP-princip har låg konfidens för att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11008">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11009">Funktionen hittar `Func_uk_drivers_license` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11009">The function `Func_uk_drivers_license` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11010">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11010">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.K. Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="f93de4be-d94c-40df-a8be-461738047551" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true" >
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-electoral-roll-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11131">Storbritannien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11131">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11132">nummer för att samla, rulla ut, 75</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11132">electoral roll number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11133">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11133">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11134">två bokstäver följt av 1–4 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11134">two letters followed by 1-4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11135">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11135">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11136">Två bokstäver (inte teckenkänsliga) följt av 1–4 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11136">two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by 1-4 numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11137">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11137">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11138">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11138">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11139">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11139">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11140">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11140">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11141">Det reguljära uttrycket Regex_uk_electoral hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11141">The regular expression Regex_uk_electoral finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11142">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_uk_electoral hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11142">A keyword from Keyword_uk_electoral is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Electoral Number -->
<Entity id="a3eea206-dc0c-4f06-9e22-aa1be3059963" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_uk_electoral" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_electoral" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11143">Nyckelord</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11143">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_electoral"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11144">Keyword_uk_electoral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11144">Keyword_uk_electoral</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11145">mötesmöte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11145">council nomination</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11146">formulär för att skapa en 20</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11146">nomination form</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11147">register över registrering av registrer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11147">electoral register</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11148">roll för underse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11148">electoral roll</span></span>

   
## <a name="uk-national-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11149">Storbritannien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11149">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11150">national health service number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11150">national health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11151">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11151">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11152">10–17 siffror avgränsade med blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11152">10-17 digits separated by spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11153">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11153">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11154">10–17 siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11154">10-17 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11155">antingen 3 eller 10 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11155">either 3 or 10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11156">ett blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11156">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11157">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11157">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11158">ett blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11158">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11159">fyra siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11159">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11160">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11160">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11161">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11161">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11162">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11162">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11163">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11163">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11164">Funktionen för Func_uk_nhs_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11164">The function Func_uk_nhs_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11165">Något av följande är sant:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11165">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11166">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_uk_nhs_number hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11166">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11167">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11167">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11168">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11168">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11169">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11169">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NHS Number -->
<Entity id="3192014e-2a16-44e9-aa69-4b20375c9a78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nhs_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11170">Nyckelord</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11170">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_uk_nhs_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11171">Keyword_uk_nhs_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11171">Keyword_uk_nhs_number</span></span>

## <a name="uk-national-insurance-number-nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11187">Storbritannien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11187">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11188">national insurance number (NINO)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11188">national insurance number (NINO)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11189">Den här typen av känslig information ingår i den nationella identifieringstypen (EU).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11189">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11190">Det är tillgängligt som en fristående typ av känslig information.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11190">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11191">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11191">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11192">Sju tecken eller nio tecken avgränsade med blanksteg eller streck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11192">seven characters or nine characters separated by spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11193">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11193">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11194">två möjliga mönster:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11194">two possible patterns:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11195">två bokstäver (giltiga NINOs använder bara vissa tecken i det här prefixet, som det här mönstret verifierar, inte de är det.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11195">two letters (valid NINOs use only certain characters in this prefix, which this pattern validates; not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11196">sex siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11196">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11197">antingen "A", "B", "C" eller "D" (t.ex. prefixet tillåts bara vissa tecken i suffixet, inte teckenkänsliga)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11197">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D' (like the prefix, only certain characters are allowed in the suffix; not case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11198">ELLER</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11198">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11199">två bokstäver</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11199">two letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11200">blanksteg eller streck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11200">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11201">två siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11201">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11202">blanksteg eller streck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11202">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11203">två siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11203">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11204">blanksteg eller streck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11204">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11205">två siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11205">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11206">blanksteg eller streck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11206">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11207">antingen "A", "B", "C" eller "D"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11207">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D'</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11208">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11208">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11209">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11209">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11210">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11210">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11211">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11211">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11212">Funktionen för Func_uk_nino hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11212">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11213">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_uk_nino hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11213">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11214">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11214">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11215">Funktionen för Func_uk_nino hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11215">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.K. NINO -->
    <Entity id="16c07343-c26f-49d2-a987-3daf717e94cc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-unique-taxpayer-reference-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11237">Storbritannien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11237">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11238">Unique Taxpayer-referensnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11238">Unique Taxpayer Reference Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11239">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11239">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11240">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11240">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11241">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11241">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11242">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11242">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11243">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11243">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11244">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11244">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11245">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11245">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11246">10 siffror utan blanksteg och avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11246">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
 
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11247">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11247">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11248">10 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11248">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11249">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11249">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11250">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11250">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11251">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11251">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11252">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11252">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11253">Funktionen hittar  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11253">The function  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11254">Ett nyckelord  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11254">A keyword from  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- U.K. Unique Taxpayer Reference Number -->
      <Entity id="ad4a8116-0db8-439a-b545-6d967642f0ec" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="us-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11274">U.S. bank account number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11274">U.S. bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11275">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11275">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11276">6-17 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11276">6-17 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11277">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11277">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11278">6–17 siffror i följd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11278">6-17 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11279">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11279">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11280">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11280">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11281">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11281">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11282">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11282">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11283">Det reguljära uttrycket Regex_usa_bank_account_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11283">The regular expression Regex_usa_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11284">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_usa_Bank_Account hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11284">A keyword from Keyword_usa_Bank_Account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="a2ce32a8-f935-4bb6-8e96-2a5157672e2c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_usa_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_usa_Bank_Account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11285">Nyckelord</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11285">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="us-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11314">U.S. driver's license number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11314">U.S. driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11315">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11315">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11316">Beror på delstat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11316">Depends on the state</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11317">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11317">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11318">beror på delstat – till exempel New York:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11318">depends on the state - for example, New York:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11319">Nio siffror med formatet sss sss sss matchar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11319">nine digits formatted like ddd ddd ddd will match.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11320">Nio siffror med ssssssssss matchar inte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11320">nine digits like ddddddddd will not match.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11321">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11321">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11322">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11322">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11323">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11323">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11324">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11324">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11325">Funktionen för Func_new_york_drivers_license_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11325">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11326">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11326">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11327">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_us_drivers_license hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11327">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11328">En DLP-princip har låg konfidens för att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11328">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11329">Funktionen för Func_new_york_drivers_license_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11329">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11330">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11330">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11331">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11331">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11332">Inget nyckelord från Keyword_us_drivers_license hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11332">No keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="dfeb356f-61cd-459e-bf0f-7c6d28b458c6 patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-individual-taxpayer-identification-number-itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11430">U.S. individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11430">U.S. individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11431">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11431">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11432">Nio siffror som börjar med "9" och innehåller "7" eller "8" som fjärde siffra, alternativt formaterade med blanksteg eller streck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11432">nine digits that start with a "9" and contain a "7" or "8" as the fourth digit, optionally formatted with spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11433">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11433">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11434">formaterat:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11434">formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11435">siffran "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11435">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11436">två siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11436">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11437">blanksteg eller streck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11437">a space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11438">a "7" eller "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11438">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11439">en siffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11439">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11440">blanksteg eller streck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11440">a space, or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11441">fyra siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11441">four digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11442">oformaterad:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11442">unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11443">siffran "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11443">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11444">två siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11444">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11445">a "7" eller "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11445">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11446">fem siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11446">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11447">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11447">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11448">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11448">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11449">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11449">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11450">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11450">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11451">Funktionen för Func_formatted_itin hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11451">The function Func_formatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11452">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_itin hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11452">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11453">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11453">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11454">Funktionen Func_unformatted_itin hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11454">The function Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11455">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_itin hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11455">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11456">En DLP-princip har låg konfidens för att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11456">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11457">Funktionen Func_formatted_itin eller Func_unformatted_itin hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11457">The function Func_formatted_itin or Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) -->
    <Entity id="e55e2a32-f92d-4985-a35d-a0b269eb687b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11459">Keyword_itin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11459">Keyword_itin</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11460">taxpayer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11460">taxpayer</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11462">tax identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11462">tax identification</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11463">itin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11463">itin</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11464">i.t.i.n.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11464">i.t.i.n.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11465">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11465">ssn</span></span>

## <a name="us-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11472">U.S. social security number (SSN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11472">U.S. social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11473">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11473">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11474">nio siffror, som kan vara i ett formaterat eller oformaterat mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11474">nine digits, which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11475">Om det har utfärdats före mitten av 2011 har SSN stark formatering där vissa delar av numret måste faller inom vissa intervall för att vara giltigt (men det finns ingen kontrollsumma).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11475">If issued before mid-2011, an SSN has strong formatting where certain parts of the number must fall within certain ranges to be valid (but there's no checksum).</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11476">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11476">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11477">fyra funktioner söker efter SSN i fyra olika mönster:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11477">four functions look for SSNs in four different patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11478">Func_ssn söker efter SSN med stark formatering före 2011 som är formaterade med streck eller blanksteg (s-ss-s eller s)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11478">Func_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11479">Func_unformatted_ssn söker efter SSN med stark formatering före 2011 som är oformaterade som nio siffror i följd (sss)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11479">Func_unformatted_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11480">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn söker efter SSN efter 2011 som är formaterade med streck eller blanksteg (s-ss-s eller s s)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11480">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11481">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn söker efter SSN efter 2011 som är oformaterade som nio siffror i följd (ss)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11481">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11482">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11482">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11483">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11483">No</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11484">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11484">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11485">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11485">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11486">Funktionen för Func_ssn hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11486">The function Func_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11487">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_ssn hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11487">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11488">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11488">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11489">Funktionen för Func_unformatted_ssn hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11489">The function Func_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11490">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_ssn hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11490">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11491">En DLP-princip har låg konfidens för att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11491">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11492">Funktionen Func_randomized_formatted_ssn hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11492">The function Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11493">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_ssn hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11493">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11494">En DLP-princip har låg konfidens för att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11494">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11495">Funktionen för Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11495">The function Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11496">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_ssn hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11496">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>


```xml
<!-- U.S. Social Security Number (SSN) -->
  <Entity id="a44669fe-0d48-453d-a9b1-2cc83f2cba77" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_formatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="55">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
  </Entity>
```

## <a name="us--uk-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11511">U.S. / Storbritannien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11511">U.S. / U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11512">passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11512">passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11513">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11513">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11514">nio siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11514">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11515">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11515">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11516">nio siffror i följd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11516">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11517">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11517">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11518">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11518">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11519">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11519">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11520">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11520">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11521">Funktionen för Func_usa_uk_passport hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11521">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11522">Ett nyckelord från `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11522">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11523">Ett nyckelord `Keywords_eu_passport_date` från hittas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11523">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11524">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11524">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11525">Funktionen för Func_usa_uk_passport hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11525">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11526">Ett nyckelord från `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11526">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.S. / U.K. Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="178ec42a-18b4-47cc-85c7-d62c92fd67f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11555">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11555">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11556">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11556">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="80fc2-11557">Regex-Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80fc2-11557">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
